title: Senior BI Analyst (Business Intelligence)

description:
Your Responsibilities Will Include


 * Participate in the development of AI, NLP, and Big Data technologies for company products such as chatbots, search engines, and data analysis systems.
 * Collect, clean, and prepare large-scale datasets for training AI models.
 * Research and apply machine learning, deep learning, and Big Data technologies to build and enhance AI solutions.
 * Evaluate model performance and propose optimization solutions.
 * Support other team members in projects and products implementation, particularly in integrating AI with Big Data technologies.
   
   

Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.


 * Solid understanding of probability and statistics, discrete mathematics, and linear algebra.
 * Knowledge of algorithms, data structures.
 * Experience with at least one framework or library (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and one programming language (Python and C# preferred).
 * Knowledge of Big Data processing tools like Hadoop and Spark, including concepts such as MapReduce and data parallelism.
 * Strong learning attitude, enthusiasm for research and a passion for exploring new AI and Big Data technologies.
 * Good communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team.
 * Good English communication.
   
   

Preferred


 * Experience participating in AI, NLP, Big Data related projects.
 * Experience working with distributed databases (NoSQL) and Big Data storage solutions.
   
   

WORK LOCATION

4F Artemis, No 3 Le Trong Tan, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi

Benefits


 * 5-day workweek with weekends off
 * Dynamic, professional environment with career growth opportunities
 * Social, medical, and unemployment insurance based on actual salary
 * Performance and salary review twice a year
 * Quarterly bonus opportunities based on performance
 * Potential for international onsite assignments
 * Regular team-building events and internal activities (weekly happy hour, quarterly team building events, Lunar New Year parties, etc.)
   
   

Any personal data you share with us during the application process will be processed strictly in compliance with applicable data protection laws and our Privacy Notice.
title: JUNIOR AI ENGINEER

description:
Our vision is to transform VPBank into a data-driven organization, propelling it toward becoming one of the top three banks in Vietnam and among the top 100 in Asia. The EDA Division, supported by a dynamic team of passionate and experienced professionals, is dedicated to unlocking the full potential of data to enhance customer experiences, accelerate business growth, improve operational efficiency, and mitigate risks. We aim to achieve this by building a next-generation enterprise data platform, advancing data governance, and promoting AI and machine learning.




The purpose of this position is to collaborate with Business Units and other departments within the EDA to analyze complex datasets, uncover customer behavior insights, and deliver actionable recommendations.




Key responsibilities:

 * Support the management of the Data Science department (with the potential to lead a small team) and guide the application of advanced analytics and data science techniques to uncover customer behaviors and solve real business problems.
 * Work directly with the head of Data Science department to give direction for advanced analytics, predictive modeling in the bank’s operations
 * Proactively propose, execute, and lead analytics projects to support business units
 * Apply data science and analytics techniques to get insights so as to help business to solve real business problems
 * Extract insights from customer behaviors using a variety of data mining techniques
 * Develop machine learning, deep learning models to assist business units in addressing various challenges, including customer churn, customer journey, recommendation engines, cross-selling products to existing customers, etc.
 * Coach & train team members
 * Automate analytics process




Who We're Looking For:

 * A Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science, or another quantitative discipline, or a related field
 * A minimum of 5-6 years of solid experience in advanced analytics and data science
 * Strong understanding and practical experience with analytical concepts and statistical techniques, including hypothesis development, complex data analysis, and drawing actionable conclusions
 * Knowledge of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, as well as familiarity with machine learning approaches, clustering, and classification techniques
 * Experience with cloud technologies and MLOps
 * Expertise in data mining and predictive modeling
 * Experience in business intelligence, including the ability to build analyses and reports using BI tools and data management practices
 * A problem-solving mindset with a commitment to self-directed learning
 * Leadership and management skills are a plus




What We Offer:

 * An attractive compensation package, including a competitive salary and bonuses based on performance (15-18 month package).
 * Holiday and New Year bonuses in accordance with banking policies.
 * Access to preferential loan options based on the bank’s policies.
 * Generous leave policy based on job rank, with 12-18 paid leave days per year.
 * Mandatory insurance in compliance with labor laws, along with VPBank care insurance tailored to employee rank and tenure.
 * Opportunities to participate in training courses aligned with the training framework for each position.
 * Working hours: Monday to Friday, with Saturday mornings off (two Saturday mornings per month).
 * A dynamic and friendly work environment offering numerous opportunities for training, learning, and professional development, along with engaging cultural activities such as sports events, talent showcases, and team-building activities.
title: Data Scientist Expert

description:
Job Description


 * Data Analysis & Reporting: Develop and manage key performance indicators (KPIs) and dashboards that provide critical insights into supply chain performance, consignment services, and retail operations. This includes building robust reporting frameworks that enhance decision-making processes.
 * Business Monitoring: Continuously monitor business metrics, identifying anomalies and trends. Investigate root causes and provide actionable insights to stakeholders through in-depth data analysis.
 * Stakeholder Communication: Collaborate with stakeholders across supply chain, retail, and consignment services to understand business needs, gather requirements, and deliver insightful data solutions that align with business objectives.
 * Continuous Improvement: Lead initiatives to enhance data management and reporting processes, ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and reliability across all dashboards and reports.
   
   

Requirements


 * 2+ years’ experience in a Business Intelligence or Data Analytics role with proven business impact.
 * Guru in Excel Pivot Table, SQL is a must.
 * Capable of leading conversations in cross-functional teams to identify problems, collect requirements, and propose steps to resolve issues - both on a macro-level and a micro-level
 * Quick learner with a can-do attitude.
 * Strong ability to create user-friendly dashboards and visualizations for stakeholders.
 * Excellent written and verbal communication skills to interact with all levels of business stakeholders.
 * Fundamental knowledge of statistical programming language (Python, R) to manipulate and draw insights from large data sets.
 * Experience with ETL processes or working alongside data engineers is a plus.

title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst (Shopee Choice) - BI & Planning, Shopee

description:
ABOUT THE ROLE

Who We Are: Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 900% in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer LTV.




About the Opportunity: As a Senior/Lead Data Analyst at Crossian LLC, you will act as the right hand to the CEO and BOM (Board of Management), providing critical data insights that influence strategic business decisions. This role demands a proactive leader who can seamlessly bridge business, tech, and Data Engineering teams, including Cloud DevOps, ensuring that all parts of the business are aligned and informed through impactful data analysis.




WHAT YOU WILL DO

Strategic Analysis & Insight Generation:

 * Collecting and Cleaning Data: Strategize and control quality for gathering data from various sources and ensure its accuracy and completeness through thorough cleaning and preparation for analysis.
 * Analysis and Insights: Conduct in-depth analysis, develop hypotheses, and provide insights that drive business strategies.
 * Data Visualization: Utilize advanced data visualization techniques to create charts and graphs that effectively communicate these insights.
 * Decision Support: Actively contribute to daily decision-making processes by delivering actionable insights to the CEO and BOM, enhancing their understanding of key business metrics and trends.
 * Predictive Analytics: Develop and implement predictive models to anticipate future trends and behaviors, providing a forward-looking perspective to business strategies.




Dashboard & BI Development:

 * BI Development: Lead the creation of a self-service BI system that includes dashboards and exploratory reports, utilizing various BI tools to meet business needs.
 * Dashboard Development: Additionally, responsible for developing and maintaining hundreds of real-time data monitoring dashboards for business operations, ensuring broad accessibility and visibility.
 * Data Management & Integration:
 * Data modeling: Define and manage schemas for business-focused data objects & Implement advanced data modeling techniques to enhance data accessibility and utility for strategic analysis and decision-making.
 * Data flows: Develop and maintain robust ELT pipelines and processes to ensure the smooth ingress and integration of data from multiple sources.
 * Data Warehouse: Oversee the management of the data warehouse, ensuring its optimal performance and alignment with business requirements.
 * Data Governance: Develop and enforce data governance policies to ensure data quality, consistency, and compliance with regulatory requirements.




Leadership & Team Collaboration:

 * Leadership: Lead a small team of DA - Data Analysts, fostering an environment of collaboration and continuous improvement. Work closely with the Business, Tech & Data Engineering teams to enhance data-driven decision-making processes;
 * Collaboration: Serve as a critical bridge between all the stakeholders ensuring clear communication and alignment on business objectives and technological capabilities.
 * Skill Development: Promote continuous professional development within the team by organizing workshops, training sessions, and encouraging certification in relevant data technologies.




Trend Analysis:

 * Global Methodologies: Continuously follow global Data Analytical methodologies and toolsets to drive strategic decisions within the organization, ensuring that our business stays ahead of Market-shifts and Technological-advancements.




WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR

 * Educational Background: Master’s degree preferred in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field. A Bachelor’s degree in these fields is also acceptable.
 * Professional Experience: At least 5 years working in DA role with proven leadership experience, ideally within eCommerce or Tech-startups.
 * Technical Proficiency: Expertise in SQL and BI tools, along with a strong understanding of data modeling, data warehousing, and real-time data monitoring. Familiarity with cloud technologies and DevOps practices is essential.
 * Database Management: Understanding the principles of database management and being able to perform exploratory data analysis is essential.
 * Analytical Skills: Superior ability to analyze complex datasets and utilize advanced data visualization techniques to derive actionable insights.
 * Communication Skills: Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, adept at presenting complex data insights clearly and influencing strategic decisions.
 * Leadership Skills: Demonstrated ability in leading data teams, promoting collaboration, and driving continuous improvement in a dynamic environment.
 * Innovative Thinking: Ability to keep pace with industry trends in data analytics methodologies and tools, applying this knowledge to drive the business forward.
 * English proficiency




Preferred (but not required)

 * Machine Learning Techniques: Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and their applications in data analysis.
 * Big Data Platforms: Experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop and Spark for handling large datasets.
 * Programming Proficiency: Skilled in programming languages like Python and R for data analysis and automation tasks.
 * Familiarity with the Agile toolset, such as Gitlab, Jira, Confluence, and Slack.




WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT

 * Competitive Compensation: Attractive salary with performance bonuses and the potential for stock options based on contribution.
 * Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and advancement within a rapidly growing global company.
 * Work Environment: Dynamic, collaborative, and innovative work culture with a focus on continuous learning and improvement.
 * Office Location: Modern office in the heart of Hanoi, equipped with the latest technologies to support your work and creativity.




Apply Now: If you are a driven data professional seeking to impact the future of eCommerce through strategic data analysis and leadership, join us at Crossian LLC. Together, we can redefine the landscape of cross-border eCommerce. Apply today to become part of our visionary team!
title: Senior Data Analyst

description:

title: JUNIOR AI RESEARCHER

description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

We are looking for a skilled AI Engineer who will join the IT Development Team. 

 * Join develop for Core Securities System; 
 * Research and develop core AI models for securities/finance: AI Recommendation, AI Portfolio Generation/ Optimization, AI Summarization;
 * Research and develop general AI models serving to improve customer experience: AI Assistant (Chat), AI Suggest for Chat, Sentiment Analysis
 * Improve the model and debug issues (if any) during development.
 * Data mining and processing. 
 * Build service for models to combine with project team for actual implementation.
 * Write research documents, reports.




YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

 * At least 3 years of working experience in AI
 * Good Math background, and deep understanding of algorithms.
 * Have a deep knowledge of ML/DL models, especially LLMs.
 * Have logical thinking, ability to deploy algorithms/build models.
 * Skills in reading and understanding scientific research (in English).
 * Having experience in training models on GG Cloud Platform is an advantage.
 * Programming language: Python, Docker, docker-image
 * Experience and passion in the field of finance, securities is preferred.
 * Have a spirit of learning, progressive and teamwork skills.




WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORK WITH US

 * Attractive compensation & salary
 * 13th month salary bonus
 * 12 days annual leave, sick days leave per year
 * Social Insurance and health insurance according to Government regulation
 * Great allowances (lunch, parking, birthday, happy hours....)

title: AI Engineer

description:
Employee Experience Overview:

The fundamentals of employee experience are making sure employees feel valued, providing the right tools and support, and creating a positive work environment. It’s all about keeping your employees happy, engaged, and motivated. With clear communication, access to the right tools, opportunities for growth, and a positive working environment, the ideal EX makes work enjoyable and fulfilling so that employees can perform at their best.




Responsibilities

1. Data Analysis and Reporting

 * Collect, analyze, and interpret data related to employee engagement, performance, and satisfaction to understand employee perspectives and derive actionable insights
 * Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to provide actionable insights into employee experience metrics




2. Process Optimization and Implementation

 * Review current processes related to employee workflows, tools, and interactions to identify areas for streamlining and automation
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and monitor process improvements that increase efficiency and effectiveness, ensuring implementation aligns with strategic objectives




3. Employee Journey Mapping

 * Collaborate with stakeholders to develop and implement strategies that enhance the employee experience at critical stages of their journey




4. Collaboration and Communication

 * Communicate findings, recommendations, and implementation plans to stakeholders at various levels through presentations and reports
 * Work with relevant departments to implement changes based on survey feedback and track their impact on employee experience




Qualifications

 * Bachelor’s degree in Business, Data Science, Human Resources, or a related field
 * Proven experience in data analysis, process optimization, survey design and administration, or a similar role
 * Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI)
 * Experience with process mapping and improvement methodologies (e.g., Lean, Six Sigma)
 * Demonstrated capability in implementing process changes from conception through to execution and monitoring.
 * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 * Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
 * Passion for enhancing employee experience and driving organizational improvement

title: Business Data Analyst

description:
Company Description


HROne, based in Hanoi, is dedicated to providing small businesses with human resources management solutions. The company aims to assist businesses in attracting, managing, motivating, and engaging their teams effectively. Through continuous research and innovation, HROne offers a range of services tailored to meet the specific needs of each business, ensuring maximum value and functionality in HR management.


Role Description


This is a full-time on-site Data Scientist role at HROne in Hanoi. The Data Scientist will be responsible for tasks such as data analysis, statistics, data analytics, data visualization, and applying data science techniques to extract insights and drive decision-making processes.


Qualifications

 * Data Science and Statistics skills
 * Data Analytics and Data Analysis skills
 * Data Visualization skills
 * Proficiency in creating insightful data reports
 * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 * Experience with machine learning algorithms
 * Knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R
 * Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field

JOB REQUIREMENTS

 * 3+ years of experience in data analytics or related roles

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS

 * 13th Salary Fixed and KPI Bonus
 * Premium Health Care
 * 24/7 Accidental Insurance
 * 100% Social Insurance
 * Meal + Phone Allowance
 * Yearly Medical Checkup
 * 15 Annual Leaves
 * Professional and Transparent Working Environment
 * Apply Latest Financial Technology in the World

description:
Obello is an AI-powered graphic design platform focused on layout generation and design automation. We act as a copilot for designers and brands, helping them create on-brand content at-scale more efficiently through AI assistance.




1/ Requirements:

 * Strong background in AI/ML with published papers at top-tier conferences, particularly in computer vision, layout generation and evaluation.

 * Experience with multi-agent systems and generative AI models
 * Proven track record in optimizing AI/ML models for production
 * MLOps knowledge for deploying and monitoring AI services

 * PhD in AI, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, or Statistics/Mathematics (preferred)
 * OR Master's degree with 3+ years of relevant research/industry experience
 * OR PhD candidate in related fields with strong research background

title: Artificial Intelligence Researcher

description:
OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life.

The Position

OPSWAT is looking for a member who can roll up their sleeves to support the Revenue Operations organization. The individual should be agile and able to work directly with our leaders of sales & commercial operations.

This role requires someone who is detail oriented and comfortable in Salesforce, MS Excel. The role is based in Vietnam, reporting to our APAC leader of Sales Ops & Analytics. The role will work with teams across the globe including San Francisco, Tampa, London, & Israel on their Business Intelligence

We are growing rapidly, and it is a very exciting time to be in the cybersecurity industry.

What You Will Be Doing


 * Day-to-day administration and operational sales support to the Sales Team
 * Database management and maintenance: Own and maintain sales data and reports clean up in SFDC system
 * Help ensure data accuracy and integrity through regular audits and quality checks
 * Support Sales team with order preparation and generations
 * Support the implementation of data management best practices and process improvements.
 * Accounts/Contacts enrichment with data from 3rd party firmographic sources (Zoominfo, 6Sense, etc.)
   
   
   

What We Need From You


 * Highly organized, proactive and responsible self-starter
 * Ability to multi-task
 * Able to work under pressure and within tight timeframes
 * Strong initiative and can demonstrate a desire to improve all areas of operation
 * Excellent written skills
 * Experience of working in a busy sales office desirable
 * Good communicator - able to manage challenging salespeople
 * Take responsibility for own actions and development
 * Willingness to take on additional tasks as and when required
 * Demonstrate positive attitude at all times
   
   
   

OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

title: Data Quality Analyst

description:
Data Engineer (Analytics) 

(1,000$ - 2,000$)




At Pod Foods Vietnam, Hanoi, Vietnam




Pod Foods is a full-service wholesale marketplace disrupting the grocery supply chain so that brands can get to the shelf more effectively, efficiently, and affordably. We are a 100% remote team (e.g. New York, Los Angeles) and a hybrid working team in Hanoi. Our vision is to create a grocery distribution network driven by data and technology so that retailers can inform their decisions based on timely and efficient delivery of data, to replace mass-market inventory with the products that consumers actually want. At Pod Foods you will positively impact the way food is being produced, distributed, and consumed.

This is an opportunity to be a data generalist: working on data infrastructure but also getting to analyze data. We have a breadth and depth of data that touches on marketing, logistics, and sales. 




Responsibilities:

 * Develop and maintain data pipelines
 * Create reports and analyze key metrics
 * Collaborate with Product Management to create data products




In this role you will (1) build data infrastructure, (2) test out new tools and open-source projects, and (3) assist in analyzing data. You will work hand-in-hand with all other teams: Operations, Sales, Finance, and Engineering. We are a small team and there are ample opportunities to contribute to a wide range of projects (e.g. data science, finance, marketing).




Key tasks:

 * Build and streamline our platform for ingesting, transforming, and distributing data
 * Help business teams understand and analyze their data
 * Managing data reporting and dissemination to stakeholders




Tech Stack:

 * Cloud: AWS
 * Orchestration: Airflow
 * Development: Python, R, Github, Jupyter
 * Data: SQL (Postgres, Snowflake)
 * Reporting: Metabase




Characteristics of a successful candidate:

 * 1 year to 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer (Analytics)
 * Proficient programming experience in SQL and Python
 * Proficient in data modeling and data warehouse design
 * Ability to navigate ambiguity and uncertainty
 * Experience creating reports and conducting data analysis
 * Proficient in English
 * Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
 * Ability to self-manage, collaborate, and be a team player




Nice-to-haves:

 * Experience with Airflow, DBT, 
 * Understand AWS services and infrastructure
 * Built pipelines incorporating Github CI/CD (e.g. DevOps)




Benefits & Perks:

 * Amazing Team & Environment: Work with top-tier colleagues who are supportive and friendly.
 * Work Schedule: Hybrid working, 9:30 AM - 5:30 PM (Mon - Fri).
 * Self-managed paid time off.
 * Competitive compensation: Based on experience, with annual salary and bonus reviews.
 *  Free Parking.
 *  Team activities: Outings and birthday celebrations.
 *  Self-improvement: Access to requested courses.
 *  Healthcare insurance: Premium insurance.
 *  Snacks & drinks: Coffee, fruits, yogurt, and your favorite snacks.
 *  Recreational activities: Piano, guitar, poker, board games, etc.




Email to apply CV: nhan@podfoods.co

description:
Job Description


 * Business Partnership: Proactively engage with internal business teams to understand their data requirements and translate business questions into analytical solutions.
 * Advanced Analytics: Conduct in-depth data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities. Develop and implement advanced analytical models to address complex business challenges.
 * Insight Generation: Deliver actionable insights to business leaders, including Cluster Heads and BI Heads, through clear and effective communication.
 * Project Management: Own end-to-end data projects, from defining the scope to delivering results. Build frameworks and trackers to monitor project progress and ensure timely delivery.
 * Stakeholder Management: Build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Effectively communicate complex data findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
 * Data Solution Development: Design, implement, and maintain a self-service data platform that enables ad-hoc access to large datasets, empowering business users to conduct their own analyses.
 * Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to improve data quality, efficiency, and effectiveness. Stay up-to-date with the latest data technologies and trends.
   
   

Requirements

 * A curious mindset with a passion for data and problem-solving.
 * Strong analytical skills with a proven ability to translate data into actionable insights.
 * Strong business acumen with a desire to understand the eCommerce industry.
 * Proficiency in SQL.
 * Experience with data modeling and analytical frameworks.
 * Experience in Python and other similar languages & tools
 * Prior experience with database and model design and segmentation techniques

description:
Python Data Scientist/Analyst

Experience: 4 - 20 Years

Location: - Anywhere in the World - Permanent Remote

Contract Duration: 6-12 months

Work Hours: 5 hours overlap with PST time zone

Standard work hours are 8 AM PST - 4 PM PST.

Must-Have


 * Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
 * At least 4 years of relevant experience as a data scientist
 * 3+ years of data analysis experience and a desire to have a significant impact on the field of artificial intelligence
 * 4+ years of experience working with Python programming.
 * Fluent in conversational and written English communication skills.
   
   

Job Description

We are actively seeking talented Data Scientists & Analysts proficient in Python to join our ambitious team dedicated to pushing the frontiers of AI technology. This opportunity is tailored for professionals who thrive on developing innovative solutions and aspire to be at the forefront of AI advancements. You will work with companies in the US looking to develop cutting-edge commercial and research AI solutions.

Job Responsibilities


 * Write effective Python code to tackle complex issues, but also use your business sense and analytical abilities to glean valuable insights from public databases
 * Communicate clearly with researchers and help the organization in realizing its objectives
 * Clearly express the reasoning and logic when writing code in Jupyter notebooks, or other suitable mediums
 * Fix bugs in the code and create thorough documentation
 * Utilize extensive data analysis skills to develop and respond to important business queries using available datasets (such as those from Kaggle, the UN, the US government, etc.)
 * Effectively communicate with the researchers to comprehend the needs and provide the results
   
   

Job Requirements


 * Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
 * At least 4 years of relevant experience as a data scientist
 * 3+ years of data analysis experience and a desire to have a significant impact on the field of artificial intelligence
 * 4+ years of experience working with Python programming
 * Strong data analytic abilities and business sense are required to draw the appropriate conclusions from the dataset, respond to those conclusions, and clearly convey the key findings
 * Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
 * Excellent communication abilities to work with stakeholders and researchers successfully
 * Fluent in conversational and written English communication skills

title: Data Scientist - LLM

description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking data-driven professionals to develop architecture, models, and protocols for data extraction, statistical reporting, and data analysis to identify trends in large datasets. Your work will apply your DS/ML/AI skills across diverse domains, leveraging both established and emerging data science principles to drive business activities.

You can choose to specialize within one of two key areas:

· MLOps Engineer: Focus on building highly efficient, distributed infrastructure for ML/AI training and deployment (60% ML, 40% DL/LLM).

· Data Scientist: Create tailored data solutions to solve business challenges, with a focus on optimization to support the fast scaling of our company, F88.




Skills:

· General Knowledge: Familiar with organizational structures and the financial/banking sector.

· Technical Expertise:

o Proficient in data science programming languages such as Python, R, or Julia, and version control (GitHub, GitLab).

o Expertise in ML frameworks like scikit-learn, xgboost/lightgbm/catboost, and experience with DL frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow/Keras, MXNet.

o Extensive experience with building data pipelines, model training, and inference in cloud environments using tools like Docker and APIs for real-time predictions.

o Strong background in AWS cloud services like S3, RedShift, Lambda, EC2 is a plus.




Responsibilities:

· Collaborate with business and opreration teams to understand workflows and organizational goals.

· MLOps Engineer:

o Build ML Infrastructure using Nvidia GPU-equipped clusters and distributed cluster to solve ML and AI at scale.

o Build automated MLOps flow for model monitoring and performance tracking.

o Automate deployment process using DevOps platform

o Scale and deploy models in live environments

· Data Scientist:

o Develop Machine Learning solution to help F88 scale up on sales and customer service activtities: Customer Segmentation model, Cross-selling model, Retention model

o Integrate Machine Learning solutions into business through A/B testing and continuous improvement.

o Create deep analysis to optimize performance of sales channels, operations and customer services.

o Create advanced deep learning solutions (Computer Vision, Speech, LLM) to optimize operation and customer-oriented services.

title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

description:
About Pencil Labs

Pencil Labs is transforming how businesses operate through cutting-edge AI and automation solutions. Our comprehensive suite of services includes autonomous WhatsApp Business chat agents, process automation, document processing and custom AI applications. We've delivered remarkable results across industries:




1. Helped a leading real estate agency achieve 25% increase in lead conversion through AI-powered qualification

2. Transformed a vehicle leasing company's operations with automated contract generation and payment processing

3. Revolutionized a food discovery platform with AI-driven recommendation systems

4. Implemented interactive AI avatars for customer service in the telecommunications sector

5. Streamlined operations for financial services firms through intelligent workflow automation




Our solutions have consistently demonstrated the power of AI to transform businesses, whether it's automating customer service, optimizing operations, or creating innovative user experiences.







Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled and passionate AI Engineer to significantly enhance our suite of AI-powered products. This role will be pivotal in driving innovation across key areas: OCR optimization, voice assistants, and intelligent chatbots. The ideal candidate will be a self-starter, comfortable with independent research and development while effectively collaborating within a cross-functional team. The position offers significant opportunity to explore and implement cutting-edge AI technologies in real-world applications.




Key Responsibilities:

 1. Lead the optimisation of our OCR tool to achieve sub-second processing times, exploring and implementing various approaches including commercial APIs and open-source solutions
 2. Research and develop voice AI assistant capabilities, focusing on integration with VOIP phone systems
 3. Enhance our WhatsApp AI assistant's conversational & functional abilities including but not limited to appointment booking
 4. Develop and implement talking AI avatars with focus on natural language processing, speech synthesis, and lip synchronisation
 5. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing and new products
 6. Stay current with AI/ML developments and evaluate new technologies for potential implementation







Required Qualifications:

 * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field.
 * 3+ years of experience in AI/ML, with a demonstrated track record of success in developing and deploying LLM-based and/or computer vision applications.
 * Professional command of English
 * Strong programming skills in Python and JavaScript (React/Next/Node/Nest).
 * Extensive experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Heroku, Zeabur), including deployment, scaling, and monitoring of AI/ML models.
 * Expertise in working with large language models (LLMs) and/or computer vision frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, relevant LLM APIs like OpenAI).
 * Experience with building and deploying mini-SaaS applications.
 * Strong problem-solving skills, ability to work independently, and excellent communication skills




Good-to-have

 * Experience with speech-to-text and text-to-speech technologies
 * Familiarity with WhatsApp Business API or similar messaging platforms
 * Background in computer vision and document processing







Why You'll Love Working Here

 * We're an engineering-focused company that takes pride in building easy-to-use, high-quality solutions
 * Work with latest AI advancements and see your solutions impact businesses across industries
 * Opportunity to work with advanced AI systems and shape the future of business automation
 * Be part of a team that values process excellence, high quality, and aesthetic precision in every product
 * Your work will directly contribute to transforming how businesses operate and interact with AI
 * Freedom to make meaningful technical decisions and own your development process
 * Fully remote position with a focus on output and impact rather than hours
 * Work alongside passionate technologists who care deeply about creating exceptional products







Your Impact

Join us in creating transformative solutions that:

1. Automate customer service operations, saving businesses hundreds of staff hours while maintaining 24/7 availability

2. Reduce lead qualification time by 25% through intelligent chatbot implementations

3. Cut preparation time for client interactions by up to 60% through automated data processing and summary generation

4. Transform traditional business processes into efficient, AI-driven workflows

5. Build innovative solutions that help businesses scale without a proportional increase in operational costs

6. Create seamless, automated experiences that consistently achieve high customer satisfaction rates

7. Implement AI solutions that handle thousands of customer interactions daily while maintaining personalized service quality




Pencil Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
title: AI Engineer

description:
As a Senior Data Analyst in the Financial Services sector, with a focus on credit products, you will leverage your expertise in data analysis to deliver actionable insights that drive business decisions. You will be responsible for analyzing large datasets, creating financial models, and working closely with cross-functional teams to optimize credit risk strategies, customer acquisition, retention, and profitability.

What you will do


 * Conduct rigorous hypothesis testing, including A/B testing, to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and product features
 * Collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that contribute to business growth and operational efficiency.
 * Leading complex data analysis projects from inception to completion.
 * Mentoring junior team members and providing guidance on technical and analytical skills.
 * Assist in creating business cases with detailed analysis, outlining problems, opportunities, solutions, strategic directions, and performance management for investment and insurance products
 * Plan, forecast and monitor performance and budget of said projects while proposing necessary changes to maximize efficiency
   
   

What you will need


 * Minimum Qualifications (education)
    * Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or Computer Science.

 * Experience:
    * At least 3 years of experience in data analytics, preferably in the financial services, credit sector.
    * Experience working with digital lending product

 * Essential skills:
    * Experience with BI/analytics tools (Google BigQuery, Data Studio..)
    * Proficiency in SQL, Python is a must
    * Familiarity with machine learning techniques and financial modeling.
    * Advanced proficiency in statistical analysis, and data visualization.
    * Ability to lead and mentor junior team members.
    * Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
    * Strong project management skills and ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

 * Personal characteristics:
    * Result-oriented
    * Do whatever it takes to get the job done
    * Curiosity and eagerness to learn new techniques and tools
    * Innovative thinking and problem-solving mindset
    * Attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work
location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
title: Senior Data Analyst (Analytics Focused)

description:
Company Description

At QIMA, we are on a mission to offer our clients smart solutions to make products you can trust.

Operating in over 100 countries, we serve the consumer products, food, and life sciences industries and help more than 30,000 brands, retailers, manufacturers, and growers achieve quality excellence.

We combine on-the-ground expertise with digital solutions that bring accuracy, transparency and intelligence for quality and compliance data.

What sets us apart is our unique culture. Our 5,000 Qimers live and make decisions every day by our QIMA Values. With client passion, integrity, and a commitment to making things simple, we disrupted the Testing, Inspection, and Certification industry. Are you ready to hop on this exciting ride with us and help us achieve our mission?

Job Description

Are you passionate about turning data into actionable insights that drive business success? We are seeking a skilled and motivated Business Intelligence Engineer to join our team.

In this role, you will leverage data to optimize internal operations, enhance business team efficiency, and empower our customers with critical information on their supply chain and quality. You will improve service quality across various aspects of supply chain management and quality assurance, driving our organization towards excellence.

If you love working with data to automate processes, solve problems, unlock new ways to analyse performance, and collaborate with cross-functional and international teams, we invite you to be a key player in our team's success!

Key Responsibilities


 * Data-driven Solutions: Work closely with business leaders to understand and identify user needs and develop data-driven solutions that optimize supply chain processes, enhance customer experiences, and improve operational efficiency.
 * Data Modelling and Automation: Design and implement scalable data models and automated processes to ensure efficient collection and integration of data from diverse sources.
 * Data Accuracy and Integrity: Ensure the data remains accurate over time by implementing data cleaning and validation procedures.
 * Collaboration with technical teams: Collaborate with the tech teams to enhance data collection processes.
 * Interactive Dashboards: Utilize Tableau Software to develop visually stunning and interactive dashboards tailored for both internal stakeholders and external clients, providing actionable insights to support decision-making.
 * Intuitive Interfaces: Collaborate with UI/UX teams and Data Visualization Lead to create intuitive interfaces that enhance user experience, leading to improved adoption and engagement with data-driven insights.
 * Performance Tuning: Continuously monitor and optimize dashboard performance to ensure swift responsiveness, providing users with seamless access to real-time insights.
 * Data Analysis and Process Improvement: Leverage data analysis to identify opportunities for process improvement and contribute to strategic projects aimed at enhancing business performance and competitiveness.
   
   

Qualifications

Candidate Requirements:


 * Education and Experience: You have master's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Supply Chain, Operations Management, Data Analytics) and have at least 3+ years of experience in a similar role, working with BI solutions such as Tableau, Power BI, Alteryx, Qlik Sense, etc.
 * Analytical Skills: Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to interpret complex datasets and derive actionable insights to drive business decisions.
 * Lean Enthusiast: You demonstrate a genuine passion for lean practices and process optimization, with a proven track record of driving efficiency improvements and cost savings through lean methodologies.
 * Data Modelling & ETL: You are able design robust data models that facilitate efficient data integration and ensure data integrity and consistency across the organization's systems and processes.
 * SQL and Database Skills: You are proficient in writing SQL queries and working with relational databases to manipulate and analyze data effectively.
 * Programming Skills: You are familiar with Python scripting for data manipulation and automation, enabling efficient data processing and analysis workflows.
 * Communication Skills: You demonstrate excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to drive data-driven initiatives forward.
   
   

Preferred Skills (not Mandatory)


 * Quality Management: You possess experience in quality management, with expertise in either laboratory testing processes, supply chain dynamics, or quality assurance. You also have a good understanding of the challenges and opportunities in those domains.
 * Data Visualization: You are familiar with data visualization best practices, and love creating compelling and informative visualizations.
 * Portfolio: You have a portfolio of existing BI projects to showcase your expertise and creativity in data visualization practices.

description:
Responsibility:

As the focal point for analyzing debt collection (DC) performance metrics, the role involves proposing principles for allocation lists, debt collection targets, and operational strategies.

 * Developing in-depth analytical reports on key metrics such as RFR, NFR, Rollback, Stabilized, Paid Off, Recovery Rate, %RPC, %TPC, and %UNC to promptly identify issues in portfolio quality and collection performance. These analyses aim to recommend improvement actions/strategies to achieve DC targets for each period.
 * Collaborating with the Business Analytics Center to produce detailed analyses on labor productivity by quantile, including metrics such as working time and productivity of collection officers. The goal is to identify high-performing collectors, propose mechanisms, and design operational methods to optimize collection performance in alignment with periodic strategies.
 * Partnering with the Advanced Analytics Department (Data Science) to define requirements and logic for developing predictive models that forecast portfolio quality. These models are based on a strategic approach using customer response data (Response-based), enabling resource allocation by strategy (Call/Field) and segment.
 * Conducting detailed segmentation analyses of collection portfolio quality based on customer responses. This includes identifying target customer profiles and recommending appropriate tactics, strategies, and contact frequencies to maximize collection efficiency.
 * Evaluating the effectiveness of financial solution programs applied to various customer segments, providing recommendations on policies and products to enhance recovery rates, reduce NPL (non-performing loans), and lower provisioning.
 * Preparing periodic and ad-hoc reports on collection activities for the Head of Debt Collection Operations Management as required.
 * Performing other duties as assigned by supervisors, in compliance with bank regulations and operational needs.




Job Requirements:

 * Bachelor’s degree or higher in Economics, Financial Mathematics, Finance – Banking.
 * Strong understanding of credit, debt collection, and debt resolution.
 * At least 2 years of experience in one of the following banking fields: risk management, debt collection, debt resolution, policy planning, or financial planning.
 * Proficiency in SQL, VBA, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.
 * English skills (written and spoken communication).
 * Expertise in data aggregation, calculation, and analysis.
 * Presentation, planning, organizational, and conflict resolution skills.
 * Ability to work under high pressure.
 * Detail-oriented, proactive, disciplined, and meticulous.
title: Collections Data Analyst

description:
Company Description

Puritype is an idea-sharing platform that aims to promote free and open discussions without censorship. Our goal is to accelerate the development of recommender systems to enhance daily life experiences. We believe in the power of technology and innovation to connect individuals and provide personalized recommendations.




Role Description

This job is going to build MVP (minimum viable product). The Data scientist will be responsible for developing causal inferences methods to estimate the effect of treatment and implementing machine learning algorithms, pattern recognition. They will also work on data analysis, statistical modeling, and algorithm optimization. The Machine Learning Engineer will collaborate with a team of engineers and data scientists to improve recommender systems.




Qualifications

 * Strong background in Computer Science and Statistics
 * Experience in developing and implementing machine learning algorithms
 * Knowledge of pattern recognition and Causal inference
 * Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R
 * Familiarity with algorithms and data structures
 * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 * Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
 * Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
 * Experience with recommender systems is a plus
title: Machine leaning engineer - Data scientist (Causal Inference)

description:
Founded in 2016, Katalon is the leading provider of a modern, comprehensive quality management platform. Katalon Platform enables quality assurance, DevOps, and software teams of any size to deliver world-class customer experiences faster, easier, and more efficiently.

Since its first launch, Katalon has experienced tremendous growth, serving more than 30,000 teams around the globe, many of which are in the Fortune Global 500, such as PwC, KPMG, Abbott, etc. Katalon is recognized as a top automation tool by prestigious review sites, such as G2, Gartner, Capterra, and IT Central Station. 


Responsibilities:

 * Data Collection and Analysis: Collect and analyze customer data, including usage patterns, feedback, and customer health metrics, to identify trends and insights that inform decision-making.
 * KPI Monitoring: Develop and maintain key performance indicators (KPIs) to track and measure customer success and satisfaction. Generate regular reports to share insights with stakeholders.
 * Customer Segmentation: Segment customers based on various criteria such as product usage, behavior, and feedback to tailor engagement strategies and support initiatives.
 * Predictive Analytics: Utilize predictive analytics models to forecast customer behavior, identify potential churn risks, and recommend proactive measures to mitigate them.
 * Customer Feedback Analysis: Analyze customer feedback and survey responses to gain insights into satisfaction levels and areas for improvement. Translate feedback into actionable strategies.
 * Product Adoption Analysis: Assess product adoption rates and identify opportunities to improve user onboarding and feature utilization through data-driven recommendations.
 * Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with Customer Success, Sales, Marketing, and Product Development teams to share insights and influence strategies for enhancing customer success.
 * Automation and Tools: Implement and maintain data automation processes and tools to streamline data collection and reporting.
 * Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in customer success analytics to continuously improve our approach.
   
   
   
   

Requirements


 * Proven experience in data analysis and reporting, with a focus on customer success or customer data.
 * Proficiency in data analysis tools and languages (e.g., Excel, SQL, Python, R).
 * Experience building dashboards, reports, or tools through BI tools such as Metabase, Power BI, Looker Studio, etc.
 * Basic knowledge of machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics
 * Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.
 * Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate data insights into actionable recommendations.
 * Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple data sources efficiently.
   
   
   
   

Benefits



At Katalon, we bring together self-starting, open-minded, and talented people while actively promoting a transparent and growth-enabling working environment. But don't just take our word for it. Take a better look below!

 * Total Remuneration: Satisfying your financial goals through competitive compensation and periodic performance bonuses.
 * Well-being & Work-life Balance: Staying healthy through comprehensive health plans, flexible work arrangements, and generous paid leaves.
 * Statutory Compliance: Labor compliance with local regulations that ensure employee security.
 * Work Facilities & Accommodation: Top-notch equipment, supportive allowances, and A-class facilities.
 * Diversity, Equity, Engagement, & Inclusion: Becoming part of a global team that celebrates differences, equal opportunity, and meaningful employee recognition.
 * Growth & Rewards: Thriving professionally through employee enablement, a culture of trust, and rewarding performance.
   
   

Katalon is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We care about our people and celebrate our differences. We want to work with talented, collaborative, and innovative people. We do not discriminate in hiring or any employment decision based on race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, genetic information, veteran status, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or other characteristics protected by law.

title: Data Scientist

description:
Responsibilities

Job Description


 * Operation Management:
   
   

Monitor system performance, data availability, and data quality.

Manage data pipelines, ensuring efficient and reliable data flow using technologies like Fivetran and Azure Databricks.

Proactively identify and address operational issues to minimize downtime and optimize performance.

Handle support requests related to data analytics operations, utilizing ticketing systems (Service Now) to track and resolve issues.

Conduct root cause analysis and troubleshoot data-related issues, using technical knowledge of Microsoft Azure Services, Databricks, Oracle, Microsoft SQL, or other relevant platforms.

Implement solutions to resolve issues promptly and effectively, collaborating with internal teams and stakeholders.


 * Security Controls & Configurations:
   
   

Implement and maintain security controls within the data analytics division, leveraging tools and services provided by Microsoft Azure.

Manage access controls, data privacy, and security policies using tools like Microsoft Azure Active Directory or similar identity and access management solutions.

Handle audit-related requests and questions, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and audit standards.

Creating and maintaining Databricks Workspaces for business and IS usage.

Collaborate with Information System (IS) infrastructure team to manage the required for data analytics operations, including cloud services provided by Microsoft Azure, GitHub etc.

Coordinate data storage, cloud services, and server configurations, leveraging technologies like Microsoft Azure.

Ensure the infrastructure supports the division's needs and aligns with security requirements.

Qualifications

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Data Analytics, Information Systems).

Proven experience in data analytics operations, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and infrastructure coordination.

Strong technical knowledge and hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure Services (E.g. Access provisioning using Microsoft Entra ID, creating resource groups, storage accounts, managing Cost Analytics Reports etc.…).

Familiarity with Databricks (Unity Catalog) or similar big data processing and analytics platforms.

Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to investigate and resolve issues efficiently.

Team player, strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

Proactive mindset with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

Must Have

Microsoft Azure Platform Services (Or similar cloud platform)

Databricks Knowledge

Additional Information

Renesas Electronics Corporation empowers a safer, smarter and more sustainable future where technology helps make our lives easier. The leading global provider of microcontrollers, Renesas combines our expertise in embedded processing, analog, power and connectivity to deliver complete semiconductor solutions. These Winning Combinations accelerate time to market for automotive, industrial, infrastructure and IoT applications, enabling billions of connected, intelligent devices that enhance the way people work and live. Learn more at www.renesas.com.

Renesas’ mission, To Make Our Lives Easier, is underpinned by our company culture, TAGIE. TAGIE stands for Transparent, Agile, Global, Innovative and Entrepreneurial. Our goal is to embed this unique culture in everything we do to succeed as a company and create trust with our diverse colleagues, customers and stakeholders.

Renesas Electronics is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer, committed to supporting diversity and fostering a work environment free of discrimination on the basis of sex, race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, sexual orientation, military status, veteran status, or any other basis protected by law. For more information, please read our Diversity & Inclusion Statement.

description:
We're looking for an AI/ML engineer with mid-level experience who has worked with Python, Pytorch or Tensorflow. Our team handles multiple projects using cutting-edge models in LLM, NLP, computer vision, among others.

Location: Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Hanoi


What You'll Be Doing


 * Collaborate with stakeholders to analyze and apply AI/ML to existing systems
 * Research and evaluate different state-of-the-art AI/ML models
 * Obtain and prepare datasets for training and fine-tuning
 * Optimize inference performance for production deployment
 * Deploy, monitor, and maintain production AI/ML systems
   
   
   

Requirements


Must have


 * Good understanding of Machine Learning and Deep Learning
 * Good understanding of fundamental concepts and models such as Embedding, Transformer, CNN, GAN, and others
 * At least 2 years of experience with Python
 * At least 1 year of experience with one of the frameworks such as Pytorch or Tensorflow
 * Experience with data processing and visualization with Pyspark, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib or Seaborn
 * Experience with working on production AI systems.
 * Experience with large AI model training
 * Experience with noSQL and SQL databases
 * Knowing how to deploy the models
 * Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
   
   
   

Nice to have


 * Experience with latest trending models (LLMs, diffusion models)
 * Have a solid foundation in Mathematics
 * Experience with MLops (model deployments, auto evaluation, monitor and detect model drifts...)
 * Experience with Agile process and Scrum methodologies
 * Experience with API development
 * Experience with cloud platforms like Azure, AWS or GCP
   
   
   

Benefits


 * Three days remote every week and four full remote weeks per year
 * Gold level Health Insurance coverage from Bao Viet Insurance, a yearly complete Health Check and social insurance
 * All office benefits and full salary during probation
 * Flexible working time starting anytime up to 10 AM working Monday - Friday with no overtime and a long lunch break
 * Allowance for everything: meals, parking, petrol, along with unlimited snacks and nice coffee every day
 * Choose from a brand-new Mac or PC device
 * Salary review twice a year with opportunities for promotions and spot awards
 * 12 days annual leave per year, with all days not taken paid out in cash, plus 2 sick leave days.
 * Yearly Training Budget up to 5 million VND per staff. On top of that, Professional coaching program, buddy system, tech talks, agile sessions, and 1on1 private English classes are available
 * Yearly company trip, monthly activities, , and other Celebrations for special days in the year, such as Women's Day, YEP, and Christmas
 * Employee-led clubs within the company; games teams, sports teams, etc
 * Modern open-space office with comfortable workspace, a PS5 games room, and chill-out areas

description:
DATA ENGINEER

Department: Information Systems Center

Location: FPT Tan Thuan 3 Building, Tan Thuan Export Processing Zone, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City

Key Responsibilities:

 * Consult on and design databases for software projects.
 * Provide database support to the software development team throughout the application development lifecycle, encompassing technology platforms (data modeling, data visualization, dashboards, ad-hoc reporting), development environment setup, and testing.
 * Develop tools and frameworks to efficiently manage and integrate data from diverse sources, enabling effective data analysis.
 * Leverage Spark, SQL, and Hadoop for large-scale data processing, improving and expanding robust, fault-tolerant data pipelines that integrate data from various storage systems and databases.
 * Provide database support to the software development team, including data model design, data visualization, dashboard creation, and ad-hoc reporting.
 * Design and implement stored procedures, functions, views, triggers, and packages.
 * Evaluate and implement new technologies and solutions to enhance system reliability and availability.
 * Collaborate with data scientists on designing machine learning models, analyzing customer behavior, and enhancing user experience.
 * Support the design of data models and database architectures.
 * Collaborate with stakeholders to define system requirements, plan and design system architecture, select appropriate software/hardware, and propose integration solutions.
 * Analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve database system issues.
 * Optimize database performance.

Qualifications:

 * Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
 * Demonstrated ability for continuous learning and skill development.
 * Familiarity with Linux operating systems.
 * Strong problem-solving skills; proficiency in algorithm design, data structures, functional programming, and software design patterns.
 * Expertise in T-SQL and PL/SQL programming, relational database systems, and distributed systems.
 * Strong understanding of database performance tuning, data modeling, data structures, and at least one database management system (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
 * Excellent analytical skills; ability to identify, analyze, and validate data-driven hypotheses.
 * Programming experience with preferred languages including Scala, Java, or Python.
 * Experience with big data processing tools such as Spark, Hadoop, and Hive.
 * Experience building and maintaining data warehouse systems.
 * Experience with data visualization tools.
 * Relevant certifications are a plus.

Benefits:

 * Competitive salary commensurate with experience, including a 13th-month salary.
 * Comprehensive benefits package compliant with Vietnamese labor law.
 * Robust employee welfare programs: annual health check-ups, specialized health insurance (FPT Care – including free medical examinations and treatment at all hospitals), employee appreciation events, and family support programs.
 * Collaborative and supportive work environment.
 * Modern and well-equipped facilities.
 * Significant opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
 * Engaging company culture with numerous activities: onboarding, team building, competitions, festivals, and celebrations.
 * Discounted FPT Telecom services.

Note: FPT Telecom does not charge any fees to applicants or interns throughout the recruitment or internship process.

HCLTECH Vietnam Company Limited belongs to HCLTech.

HCLTech is a global technology company, home to more than 223,400 people across 60 countries,

delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud, and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending June 2023 totaled $12.8 billion. To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit https://www.hcltech.com/.




Our Vietnam-based offices:

• Hanoi Office: Level 13-17, Leadvisors Tower, 643 Pham Van Dong Street, Co Nhue Ward, North

Tu Liem District, Hanoi

• HCMC Office: Level 11, Five Star Tower, 28Bis Mac Dinh Chi Street, Da Kao Ward, District 1, HCMC




DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – buying a home, building a business, or saving for big or small things. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future. Be a part of building the ideal data ecosystem from scratch. Ensuring the right data is generated from all

applications and sourced at the right velocity with the complete depth and breadth to ensure complete coverage and reuse. This is your opportunity to build new, not fix old.

What will your day look like:

• Building and running the data processing pipeline on Google Cloud Platform

• Work with Implementation teams from concept to operations to provide deep technical expertise for successfully deploying large scale data solutions in the enterprise and use modern

data/analytics technologies on GCP

• Design pipelines and architectures for data processing

• Implement methods for DevOps automation of all parts of the built data pipelines to deploy from development to production

• Formulate business problems as technical data problems while ensuring that key business drivers

are captured in collaboration with product management

• Extract, load, transform, clean and validate data

• Support and debug data pipelines




JOB REQUIREMENTS

We are trying to reimagine the way we help and interact with our customers, so we are looking for

candidates with creativity, an open mind and positive energy. Our requirements are as below:

Must have:

 * Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field
 * At least 2 Years of Experience working on developing backend / platform applications using modern programming languages such as Python, Java, JS, Go, Rust.
 * Experience with provisioning services on top of Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) & Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CDK, Pulumi...)
 * Experience with constructing CI/CD workflows.
 * Experience with (or having knowledge on) building data intensive applications.
 * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues.
 * Working proficiency in English, both verbal and writing.

Nice to have:

 * Experience in developing big-data pipelines (batch, streaming processing) is a huge plus
 * Experience in developing automation processes and Observability is a huge plus.
 * Interested in working with data platforms / eager to learn more about data is a huge plus.
 * Familiar with Docker, K8S




WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US:

• Very challenging project with ANZ Bank where latest technology are applied and talented engineers are gathered

• Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus.

• Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for

Employee and Family

• 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working

• 100% salary during probation time

• Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to

travel onsite (in 60 countries)

• Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English)

• Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries

• 18 paid leaves per year

• Hybrid Mode (3 working days at office, flexible time)




HCLTECH Technologies Limited is committed to protecting and securing the privacy and confidentiality of the Personal Data which it collects directly or indirectly from you when applying for a job at HCLTECH either directly or through a third-party human resources agency.




We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCLTECH Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission.

description:
FOUNDED IN 1926, PUBLICIS GROUPE IS NOW THE 2ND LARGEST COMMUNICATIONS GROUP IN THE WORLD. THROUGH A POWERFUL ALCHEMY OF CREATIVITY AND TECHNOLOGY, WE ARE DRIVING BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION ACROSS THE ENTIRE VALUE CHAIN.





Job Description



Join Digitas as a Data Analytics Manager, where you'll collaborate with brilliant minds to pioneer marketing solutions and transform ambitious businesses.



We're seeking a talented individual with a passion for data and technology, who can analyze large datasets from multiple sources, drive insights, and contribute to the bigger picture of marketing and business.



If you're ready to be part of a dynamic team and make a difference in marketing analytics, apply now!



Responsibilities:



As an Data Analytics Manager you will ensure robust analytical frameworks and methodologies are applied for our Clients.



Together with your Team of Executives and other stakeholders in Vietnam and SEA, you will gather, organize / structure, and validate large data sets from various activities, sources and markets. Then, using data mining, science and visualization techniques you will analyze data sets to find insights that will help inform plans and improve performance.



Detailed responsibilities include:



 * Gain deep knowledge of the Client's business, data, and marketing technology stack
 * Analyze large marketing datasets in a variety of databases and systems, to uncover insights and trends for informed decision-making
 * Collaborate with cross-functional Teams to collect data requirements, identify data-driven solutions and optimization opportunities
 * Design, develop, and maintain performance dashboards, reports, and visualizations for effective communication of insights to various internal and external stakeholders
 * Optimize data storage, connectivity, and retrieval processes and relevant technology solutions
 * Implement data quality and integrity measures including database schema and data pipeline to ensure accurate, integrated and valid / reliable analytics outputs
 * Conduct quality checks on collected data to identify and resolve any inconsistencies or discrepancies, track and resolve issues
 * Identify process improvement and automation opportunities to enhance data analytics operations and outcomes
 * Lead the kick-off meeting to explain the data collection process, timeline, requirements, and the weekly check-ins to track each market's progress and perform quality checks
 * Develop and maintain relevant processes and documentations
 * Ensure adherence to established guidelines, compliance with data privacy and security regulations
   
   

Qualifications


 * 3 years of experience in data analytics, preferably in relevant media and communications, marketing environments.
 * Understanding of media planning and media / CRM activation principles as well as familiarity with data/reports from martech platforms like Salesforce, CM360, DV360, Facebook, Google Ads, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter, etc.
 * Strong analytical skills with expertise in data manipulation, statistical analysis, and large-scale data visualization
 * Knowledge of data warehousing technologies, including data modeling, schema design, and ETL processes
 * Solid understanding of media and communications, related performance metrics, and attribution models
 * Proven end to end experience in managing analytical projects and Team independently, effectively and efficiently
 * Strong problem-solving abilities and strategic thinking for data-driven decision-making, attention to details
 * Excellent communication skills to convey complex data insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders (fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English)
 * Familiarity with data security and privacy practices, including access controls, encryption, and anonymization
 * Passion for discovering untapped opportunities for clients and contributing to the team's success
   
   

Additional Information


 * Potential challenges and chances
 * Work in a professional, active, international and dynamic environment.
 * Open to travel oversea for training in Singapore
location: District 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
