description:
About Buymed

Buymed is a leading healthcare technology company revolutionizing the procurement and distribution of medical supplies. Our innovative platform connects medical institutions with suppliers, enhancing efficiency and ensuring timely access to essential resources. We are dedicated to fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and growth. Join us to make a significant impact in the healthcare industry.




Advanced Report Development and Analysis:

 * Lead the creation and enhancement of comprehensive financial and accounting reports for the e-commerce pharmaceutical sector.
 * Develop and maintain advanced BI dashboards and reports to provide detailed insights into financial performance, accounting operations, and key metrics.
 * Analyze large datasets to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities for operational improvements.

Strategic Financial Insights:

 * Provide strategic financial insights and recommendations to senior management based on data analysis and reporting.
 * Conduct deep dives into financial data to support budgeting, forecasting, and strategic planning efforts.
 * Evaluate and interpret financial performance data to guide decision-making and drive business growth.

Cross-Functional Collaboration:

 * Support the Finance team with accurate and timely data for financial reporting and analysis.
 * Work with the Accounting team to ensure data integrity and accuracy in financial reporting.

System Improvement and Optimization:

 * Identify and implement enhancements to BI tools and systems to improve data accuracy, reporting efficiency, and overall system performance.
 * Recommend and drive process improvements to streamline financial and accounting operations within the e-commerce platform.

Monthly/Quarterly Reporting:

 * Oversee the preparation of monthly and quarterly financial reports, including reconciliation and variance analysis.
 * Review and validate data from various sources to ensure accuracy and completeness of financial reporting.

Data Governance and Compliance:

 * Ensure adherence to data governance policies and financial regulations in all BI reporting and analysis.
 * Maintain data security and privacy standards while handling sensitive financial and accounting information.




Job Requirements:

 * Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Data Science, or a related field.
 * Extensive experience in business intelligence, financial analysis, and accounting, ideally within the e-commerce or pharmaceutical industry.
 * Proficiency in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar platforms, with a strong track record of developing advanced reports and dashboards.
 * Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and provide actionable insights.
 * Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present findings to senior management and collaborate effectively across departments.




Additional Information

Work Environment: Buymed is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Salary and Benefits:

 * Salary Negotiation: Opportunities for salary discussions and adjustments based on performance and market conditions.
 * Annual Performance and Salary Review: Regular evaluations to discuss performance and adjust compensation as needed.
 * Social Insurance: Comprehensive social insurance coverage based on full salary.
 * PVI Insurance: Coverage through PVI Insurance for added security and peace of mind.
 * Medical Checkup: Regular health checkups to ensure your well-being.
 * Annual Leave: 15 days of paid annual leave to support work-life balance.
 * Parking Allowance: Financial support for parking expenses.
title: Senior Business Intelligence (Financial & Analyst)

description:
Global Fashion Group (GFG) is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in Latin America, Southeast Asia and Australia New Zealand. From our people to our customers and partners, we exist to empower everyone to express their true selves through fashion. Our three ecommerce platforms: Dafiti (LATAM), ZALORA (SEA) and THE ICONIC (ANZ) connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to a market of 800 million consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. GFG’s platforms provide seamless and inspiring customer experiences from discovery to delivery, powered by art & science that is infused with unparalleled local knowledge. Our vision is to be the #1 fashion & lifestyle destination in LATAM, SEA and ANZ, and we are committed to doing this responsibly by being people and planet positive across everything we do.

THE TEAM

Our vision to bring affordable and sustainable fashion to customers in our markets is powered by technology and data. The GFG Data Team is an integral part of GFG and is essential to enabling a data-driven decision-making culture. The Data team sits at the cross-roads of various departments ranging from Category Management (Buying & Planning), Finance, Customer Service, Marketing & Fulfilment Centre. It is an exciting place to be and allows us to provide unique insights about the business, its environment and the marketplace.

SCOPE OF ROLE

We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst who is happy to play across the data spectrum - of data engineering, data science and data analytics.

You should have a demonstrated passion for data analysis in gathering data from various sources, reviewing and interpreting it using data analytics tools to provide meaningful information and insights to help the business to make better-informed decisions.

HOW YOU’LL SUCCEED

Senior Data Analyst will play a pivotal role in driving data-driven decision-making within the organization. The scope of their responsibilities will encompass the following key areas:

Data Acquisition and Management

 * Data Sourcing: Identify and acquire relevant data from diverse sources, including internal databases, external datasets, and APIs.
 * Data Cleaning and Preparation: Perform data cleansing, normalization, and transformation to ensure data quality and consistency.
 * Data Governance: Establish and enforce data governance policies to maintain data integrity and security.

Data Analysis and Visualization

 * Advanced Analytics: Employ advanced analytical techniques such as statistical modeling, machine learning, and data mining to extract valuable insights.
 * Data Visualization: Create clear and compelling data visualizations (e.g., charts, graphs, dashboards) to effectively communicate findings to stakeholders.
 * Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): Develop and track KPIs to measure business performance and identify areas for improvement.

Business Intelligence and Reporting

 * Business Intelligence (BI): Design and implement BI solutions to provide actionable insights for decision-making.
 * Reporting: Develop and deliver regular reports on key metrics and trends to inform strategic planning.
 * Ad-hoc Analysis: Conduct ad-hoc analyses to address specific business questions or investigate emerging trends.

Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement

 * Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with teams across the organization to understand their data needs and provide tailored solutions.
 * Stakeholder Communication: Effectively communicate complex data concepts and findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
 * Data Literacy: Promote data literacy within the organization to foster a data-driven culture.



WHAT IT TAKES

 * Bachelors or Masters degree is Computer Science and Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics.
 * Proficiency in data analysis tools: Expert knowledge of tools like SQL, Python, R, AWS QuickSight, Tableau, Power BI, or other relevant software.
 * Statistical and Machine Learning: Strong understanding of statistical concepts and machine learning algorithms.
 * Cloud Platforms: Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is beneficial.
 * Nice to have:  Understanding of HDFS, Spark, Presto, Airflow, Trino, Iceberg, Kafka etc.
 * Nice to have: CI/CD, containerization, experience in data ecosystem



WHAT WE OFFER YOU

 * The unique opportunity to have a serious impact on a well-established player in the fashion ecommerce industry across LATAM, SEA and ANZ
 * Valuable experience as the business navigates a dynamic and evolving market landscape
 * Work closely with a diverse and talented global team across 11 countries



Apply today and join GFG in this exciting role shaping the face of fashion e-commerce!

Global Fashion Group embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse team representing all backgrounds, with as wide a range of perspectives as possible, and harnessing industry-leading skills. We believe that the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.

description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join my client. The successful candidate will be responsible for analyzing complex datasets, creating meaningful reports, and providing actionable insights to support business decisions where accuracy and understanding of the data is critical.




Key Responsibilities:

 * Analyze and interpret large datasets to identify trends and insights.
 * Develop dashboards and visualizations to communicate findings effectively.
 * Collaborate with teams to understand data needs and deliver solutions.
 * Ensure data accuracy through cleaning, validation, and transformation.

title: HCM - Middle/ Senior Data Analyst (Financial data experience)

description:
What You Will Do


 * Analyze and interpret complex data sets, applying statistical techniques to produce actionable insights and comprehensive reports
 * Contribute to the development, testing and maintenance of data science products
 * Identify, analyze, and interpret patterns or trends in data to uncover opportunities for the company’s benefit.
 * Develop and present recommendations for revenue optimization and other strategic improvement.
 * Proactively seek opportunities to enhance company operations, products, and processes through data-driven insights.
   
   
   

What You Need To Have


 * At least one year of professional experience in the Information Technology/Computer Science field, ideally within the Banking/Finance industry.
 * Exceptional ability to collect, organize, analyze, and interpret significant amounts of information, with a strong emphasis on detail and accuracy.
 * Proficiency in database management (SQL) and computer programming, with a focus on languages like Python, Java or C++.
 * Foundational understanding of statistical methods, with a drive to apply this knowledge effectively in a business context.
 * Strong commitment to serving business stakeholders by delivering insights and recommendations in a timely manner.
 * Experience in machine learning techniques, NLP applications, and big data processing platforms is a plus.
   
   
   

What You Will Get


 * Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses
 * Comprehensive health care coverage for you and your dependents
 * Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours
 * Convenient central district 1 office location, next to a future metro station
 * Onsite lunch with multiple options, including vegetarian
 * Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations
 * Fun and engaging team building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday
 * Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized
 * An opportunity to make a social impact by helping to democratize credit access in emerging markets.
   
   
   

About Us

We are an AI Fintech company specialized in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020 we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1 billion consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry, in particular, to provide the "un & under" served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights.

But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in the markets where we operate. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at an unprecedented scale.

As a firm, we're audacious problem-solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership - of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do, and agility in execution.

We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best, and what is innovative. If you are smart, driven, and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology, come join our team. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to really make an impact.

Additional Info

Learn more about us here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inAEDGvOcL8&t=29s

description:
Working Location: Me Linh Point Tower, 02 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, Ho Chi Minh

MAIN PURPOSE OF ROLE

A Data Scientist is a proficient specialist who applies mathematical, problem-solving, and coding skills to manage big data, extracting valuable insights. They design tailor-made solutions from this data, aiding organizations in achieving their unique objectives and goals.

Data Scientist Responsibilities Include


 * Undertaking data collection, preprocessing and analysis
 * Building models to address business problems.
 * Presenting information using data visualization techniques
   
   

This role requires one to be highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics. Critical thinking and problem-solving skills are essential for interpreting data. We also want to see a passion for machine-learning and research.

Main Responsibilities

Undertaking data collection, preprocessing and analysis


 * Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes
 * Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data
 * Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends
   
   

Building models to address business problems


 * Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
 * Combine models through ensemble modeling
   
   

Presenting information using data visualization techniques


 * Present information using data visualization techniques
 * Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges
 * Collaborate with engineering and product development teams
   
   

Minimum Background/ Experience Required

Work Experience : Minimum 6 years


 * Proven experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst
 * Experience in data mining
 * Understanding of machine-learning and operations research
 * Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++ is an asset
 * Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop)
 * Analytical mind and business acumen
 * Strong math skills (e.g. statistics, algebra)
 * Problem-solving aptitude
 * Excellent communication and presentation skills
   
   

Education Level

BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field; graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative field is preferred

CORE Skills Required


 * Organization and planning skills
 * Analytical thinking
 * Reporting skills
 * Interpersonal skills
 * Problem solving skills.
 * Time management
 * Good command of English

description:
At Tether, we're committed to making advanced AI technologies more accessible. Thanks to its investment in AI infrastructure, starting from Northern Data, Tether is now in a prime position to tackle ambitious AI projects. Our goal is to build the next generation of AI models, leading innovation in AI, through an accessible, transparent and privacy preserving approach.

The role involves building AI solutions across the spectrum from large-scale models designed for advanced applications to smaller, highly performant models tailored for efficiency on edge devices such as mobile phones and laptops.

Our dynamic team operates entirely remotely, uniting talent from every corner of the globe. Our journey has been marked by rapid growth and efficient operations, firmly establishing us as pioneers within the industry. Join us in building AI models and solutions that not only compete with but exceed the capabilities of current leaders, driving both technological advancement and broad accessibility.

What You'll Do:


 * Work on deploying machine learning models to edge devices using frameworks such as TVM, MLC, and IREE (MLIR).
 * Collaborate closely with researchers to assist in coding, training and transitioning models from research to production environments.
 * Integrate AI features into existing products, enriching them with the latest advancements in machine learning.
 * Excellent programming skills in Python, C and C++.
 * Experience with platforms such as TVM, MLC, and IREE (MLIR), which facilitate the deployment of models to specific GPU architectures.
 * Experience in NLP, computer vision, TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX and CUDA toolkit.
 * Demonstrated ability to rapidly assimilate new technologies and techniques.
 * A degree in Computer Science, AI, Machine Learning, or a related field, complemented by a solid track record in AI R&D.
title: AI Inference Engineer (Edge) (100% Remote - Vietnam)

description:
Summary

Join Aperia Solutions, a leader in SaaS solutions for the Payments and Compliance industries. Aperia is a Texas-based fintech and managed consultancy firm that creates custom SaaS applications and other software-based solutions for the payments, banking, and processing industry. Founded in 1999, Aperia offers business intelligence, risk management, compliance, and customer intelligence platforms. With offices in Dallas, Washington DC, and Vietnam, Aperia is a fast-paced, global organization that strives to improve efficiency in compliance, risk, and customer service operations. Aperia's clients include banks, processors, payment facilitators, merchant service providers, independent sales organizations, and government entities. A career at Aperia promises a great challenge, culture, and opportunities to forge your own path.

Job Description

At Aperia, we rely on a dynamic team of developers. We're seeking a Data Engineer (Talend) who possesses strong experience using Talend and is ready to work with new technologies and architectures in a forward-thinking organization that's always pushing boundaries.

Core Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:


 * Design, develop, test, and deploy new ETL pipelines or enhancements to existing pipelines using Talend.
 * Perform application software development, which includes new development, maintenance and support of applications and provide production support
 * Translate functional requirements into technical designs
 * Perform end to end automation of ETL process for various datasets that are being ingested into the big data platform
 * Develop and integrate software applications using suitable development methodologies and standards, applying standard architectural patterns, considering critical performance characteristics and security measures
 * Resolve customer complaints with data and respond to suggestions for improvements and enhancements
 * Recommend strategies for technical aspects of projects as well as broad system improvements
 * Ensures adherence to established standards and may consult with senior managers on technology solutions.
   
   

Experience


 * 5+ years of related IT experience
 * 1+ years development experience with Talend Data Integration module
 * 1+ years of Experience with Talend Administration Center, Data Quality, API Designer and Services.
 * 1+ years of experience with Hadoop, Hive, HDFS and Oracle RDBMS
 * Experience with database schema, object management, data modeling & architecture, and data warehouse design
 * Strong knowledge of Java programming and PL- SQL
 * Experience with API integration (REST)
 * Working knowledge of Unix/Linux and Shell script
 * Working knowledge of source-code control using a tool such as GitLab
 * Experience with CI/CD and DevOps development using secure coding practices
 * Performance tuning is a plus
 * Knowledge in emerging cloud technologies related to Big Data is a plus
 * Previous experience in Finance/Banking industry is a plus
 * Performs additional job duties as required
   
   

Schedule: Monday to Friday

Location: Remote in Vietnam

Benefits


 * Health insurance
 * Dental insurance
 * Paid time off
 * Parental leave
 * Childcare assistance
   
   

This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. An employee may also perform other reasonable related business duties as assigned by their immediate supervisor or management. Principals only.

Recruiters please don't contact this job poster. DO NOT contact us with unsolicited services or offers.

description:
Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be in the top 1% retailers on Amazon US. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 300 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry.

We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only Amazon‘s sporting goods market but also to enter new e-commerce markets from many regions like Canada, Europe, Japan. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge of E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end eecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets.

Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently.

Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing.

I. Job Descriptions


 * Data Analysis and Insights
 * Conduct thorough analysis of data from various sources, including sales, marketing, and customer behavior, to identify trends, generate actionable insights, and support strategic initiative.
 * Reporting and Dashboards
 * Design, develop, and maintain comprehensive and visually appealing dashboards and reports that facilitate data-driven decision-making across departments.
 * Advanced Analytics
 * Utilize advanced analytical techniques, including statistical analysis and predictive modeling, to provide deeper insights into business performance.
 * Cross-Functional Collaboration
 * Work closely with stakeholders from different departments (e.g., marketing, sales, technology) to understand their data needs and ensure alignment with overall business goals.
 * Data Quality and Governance
 * Ensure the accuracy, integrity, and consistency of data by implementing and maintaining data quality and governance standards.
 * Mentorship and Support
 * Provide guidance and support to junior analysts, fostering their development and enhancing the overall analytical capability of the team.
 * Tool and Technology Optimization
 * Stay up-to-date with the latest BI tools and technologies, and recommend and implement improvements to enhance analytical processes.
   
   

Ii. Requirements


 * Knowledge
 * A bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field. Advanced degrees are a plus.
 * Skills
 * Proficiency in BI tools (such as Power BI), along with strong SQL skills. Knowledge of programming languages like Python is the must. Familiarity with Airflow, Jenkins is a plus.
 * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
 * Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey data-driven insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
 * Experience
 * A minimum of 3 years of experience in a business intelligence or data analytics role, preferably within the e-commerce sector.
   
   

III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US?


 * FOR YOU TO JOIN
 * Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances.
 * Salary review: annually or on excellent performance.
 * Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events.
 * Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year.
 * Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package.
 * Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration.
 * FOR YOU TO GROW
 * Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge.
 * Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work.
 * Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry.
 * FOR YOU TO STAY
 * People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication.
 * Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best.
 * Career path: Provide you with a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions.
   
   

And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

title: Data Engineeer

description:
1. General Description




The Land Transport Department is responsible for the management and growth of Schenker’s land transportation business. As part of our growth initiatives, we are implementing a multiple IT initiative as well as operational improvement across Asia Pacific.




The primary responsibility is to be responsible to plan and execute the implementation of the IT initiatives in your country. Activities include requirements gathering, systems solutioning and configuration, conduct training, analysis and process improvements and implementing new processes and tools to streamline our implementations. You will represent your country as part of the APAC TMS Competency Community. As part of the team, you will also support the rollouts in other APAC countries and ensure that knowledge is shared across the TMS Competency Community.




The secondary responsibility is to be responsible for continuous improvement activities. The person will identify process improvement initiatives for current operations process. Activities include process review, time-motion study, executing LEAN initiatives and implementing the solutions.

2. Specific Accountabilities:

a. Systems and Innovation (Data Engineer)

Solution, configure and implement systems to meet business requirements

Monitoring of implementation and rollout of assigned projects

Train systems consultant, super-users and end-users

Create implementation toolkits, models and templates to streamline the implementation process

Ensure that knowledge is effectively shared and maintained across the company

Continuously improve and develop innovative system solutions to support As-Is and To-Be Land product development

Conduct industry research and liaise with IT stakeholders to implement new systems

Recommending and implementing changes, and ensuring a successful transition to what’s new

Review of existing process and identifying and implementing process improvement initiatives

3.HSSE

Understand the HSSE policy of the company

Follow the HSSE policy of the company

Report near misses to Manager / Supervisor




Skills Required

Strong critical thinking, analytical and problem-solving skills

Good mix of business and systems knowledge

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both verbal and written (English); fluency in other Asian languages a plus

Team player with a good working attitude and the ability to learn quickly

Keen eye for process improvement




Experience and Qualifications

1-year or fresh graduated to Data Engineer (IT background basic) systems implementation-related experience or in logistics-related operations in refer

University degree Information Systems or IT-related discipline, or in Logistics operation/Logistics engineering if any

Experience in transport management systems implementation especially BluJay LSP TMS a big plus

Skill: Macros, data analysis, pythons, integration system, Power platform (Power BI, Power automates, Power Apps), Basic coding macro, query data…

title: AI Engineer

description:
About Us

Why we started Featurii

Work is such a fundamental part of life; save for the lucky few, we all have to work. It's how we provide for our family and contribute to society.

Yet, if you lose your job today, it's likely going to take you months to find a new one - even then, it might not be the best fit.

We've all become so desensitised to the lengthy job searching process, applying to job one by one, day after day, answering the same old interview questions over and over, that we no longer stop to ask why it has to be this way.

And, it's not like the employers enjoy this too. As an employer myself, I can attest to how disruptive and painful it is when an employee leaves the company. Often, the search for a replacement can take more than 3 months, and we've had roles that took us almost a year to fill.

Just to fill a role, I estimate that the average employer has to conduct at least 50 screening calls, and 20 interviews, which is a colossal waste of time and productivity.

Many accept this as the way life is for both sides.

We disagree.

Solving the problem

How could it be that in this time and age, job matching still has to take months?

I'll tell you why.

It's because the CV simply doesn't contain enough information for the hirers to make a hiring decision. The corollary is that, to extract additional information from the candidates, each hirer has to invite the candidate for multiple rounds of interview, and each interview set up takes days / weeks to arrange for both sides.

Hence, we endeavour to create a common job application system whereby job seekers just have to answer a set of interview questions once, which is then video recorded, so all hirers can have access to the information and do NOT need to manually interview to ask for those information.

In theory, an AI can eventually conduct the interview much better than the average hiring manager, such that the hiring process is more objective and devoid of biases. If that be the case, then the employer can simply jump straight to the final round of interview, and life becomes better for both sides.




Job Description

We are looking for a Backend Python Engineer with strong skills in AI and Algorithms who will play a crucial role in evolving and scaling our recruiting software solutions. We are seeking a highly skilled professional with extensive experience in backend development and a passion for building robust, scalable web applications. The successful candidate will work in close collaboration with our Web Developers, Product Development, and Product Design teams to ensure our backend architecture supports the rapid deployment of new features.

Upon joining the team, your responsibilities will include:

 * Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable backend code using Python mainly.
 * Design and develop AI models to meet project requirements
 * Convert AI/ML models into APIs that other developers can use
 * Perform statistical analysis on big data sets
 * Manage project infrastructure and the development of AI models and projects
 * Work with other machine learning engineers, data engineers, and AI engineers to develop machine learning models
 * Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.
 * Lead the integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic, ensuring optimal performance.
 * Implement security and data protection measures, managing the storage and handling of sensitive user data.
 * Engage in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including ideation, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
 * Research, evaluate, and implement new technologies and frameworks to optimize development processes and enhance product capabilities.




Our requirements

We are seeking candidates who possess:

 * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
 * Minimum of 3 years of experience in backend development, with a proven track record in:

Language: Python and strong experience with AI (knowing Java and Type would be a plus)

Database: PGSQL, MongoDB

CMS: Strapi

 * Strong understanding of the web development cycle and programming techniques and tools.
 * Deep expertise in data modeling, SQL, and NoSQL databases.
 * Deep expertise in design pattern, microservices and development principle.
 * Familiarity with code versioning tools, such as Git, and CI/CD pipelines.
 * Experience with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is highly desirable.
 * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently to research and apply new technologies.
 * Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
 * Fluency in English is a plus.




Benefits and Opportunities

Candidates will have unparalleled learning opportunities for learning and accelerated career growth working in a fast-paced, hyper-growth startup environment. As a member of the team, you’ll have opportunities to:

 * Competitive negotiable salary based on previous experience.
 * Full social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance.
 * Quarterly performance-based bonuses.
 * Develop core competencies in the areas of technology and computer science.
 * Take on high-impact projects that push the technological frontier of the company.
 * Work with world-class team members hailing from leading organizations, such as Goldman Sachs, McKinsey, Harvard Business School, University of Pennsylvania, etc.
 * Attractive employee stock option package.
 * Accelerated career path with arguably the most exciting prop-tech startup in Southeast Asia.
 * Young, dynamic, and fast-paced working environment.

description:
Data Analytics, & CRM Administrator is one of the key contributors to Commercial Excellence who is responsible for developing the holistic database, analytics and visualization across data points of business operations in both top-line and bottom-line standpoints. Furthermore, this position contributes to the drive of sales planning and customer management on regular basis in terms of framework, technological application and thereby excellence in execution in local business operations. He/she will also play a critical role to ensure all of the incentive scheme compliantly calculated and proceeded throughout approval workflow.

Position Responsibilities

Data Science, Analytics


 * Apply business insights and G2M understanding to continuously and resiliently innovate the company dashboard holistically across dimensions of the business as single source of performance management of business operational indicators including revenue, distribution, customer management, inventory level, and other FFE performance database.
   
   

Develop the framework for sales planning activities annually in terms of historical data and customer mapping across business lines in alignment with up-to-date strategic imperatives.


 * Drive the holistic data visibility of inventory management for all in-market SKUs across touchpoints from demand planning to warehouses at Zoetis, LSP, ZPC(s) and ultimately customers warehouses in strong collaboration with other stakeholders including Supply Chain, Logistics, and Business Lines.
 * Serve as coordinator with 3rd party for the management of Distribution Management System (DMS) where applied especially to ZPCs as well as generate the data analytics and visualization of distribution performance across channels and species.
 * Evaluate the sales performance for all relevant salesforce who is eligible for incentive on quaterly basis with transparency and complaince
 * Nurture the One Zoetis corporate value by integrating all teams in terms of standard framework and data-based business management as well as embracing and encouraging best practices which cultivate the enhanced standards and disciplines across business lines.
 * Serve as In-house Consultant for Data Science, Analytics and Visualization to drive discussion and alignment on related business improvement proposal in identifying the opportunities to enhance the database management on Dashboard across the go-to-market model for each and every business lines as well as drive alignment on solutions, processes and initiatives.
   
   

CRM Administration


 * Serve as point of administration of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system on salesforce.com in collaboration with global/cluster experts. Serve as key contact point for ensuring customer database always up-to-date sufficiently in collaboration with Customer Service, Business Lines and Field Force Effectiveness
 * Serve as In-house Consultant for CRM platform utilization with strong collaboration with Cluster ZTD, FFE in enhancing the system from technical and business needs

title: Data Analytics, & CRM Administrator

description:
What You Will Do


 * Analyze and interpret complex data sets, applying statistical techniques to produce actionable insights and comprehensive reports
 * Contribute to the development, testing and maintenance of data science products
 * Identify, analyze, and interpret patterns or trends in data to uncover opportunities for the company’s benefit.
 * Develop and present recommendations for revenue optimization and other strategic improvement.
 * Proactively seek opportunities to enhance company operations, products, and processes through data-driven insights.
   
   

What You Need To Have


 * At least one year of professional experience in the Information Technology/Computer Science field, ideally within the Banking/Finance industry.
 * Exceptional ability to collect, organize, analyze, and interpret significant amounts of information, with a strong emphasis on detail and accuracy.
 * Proficiency in database management (SQL) and computer programming, with a focus on languages like Python, Java or C++.
 * Foundational understanding of statistical methods, with a drive to apply this knowledge effectively in a business context.
 * Strong commitment to serving business stakeholders by delivering insights and recommendations in a timely manner.
 * Experience in machine learning techniques, NLP applications, and big data processing platforms is a plus.
   
   

What You Will Get


 * Competitive compensation package, including 13th-month salary and performance bonuses
 * Comprehensive health care coverage for you and your dependents
 * Generous leave policies, including annual leave, sick leave, and flexible work hours
 * Convenient central district 1 office location, next to a future metro station
 * Onsite lunch with multiple options, including vegetarian
 * Grab for work allowance and fully equipped workstations
 * Fun and engaging team building activities, sponsored sports clubs, and happy hour every Thursday
 * Unlimited free coffee, tea, snacks, and fruit to keep you energized
 * An opportunity to make a social impact by helping to democratize credit access in emerging markets.
   
   

About Us

We are an AI Fintech company specialized in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020 we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1 billion consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry, in particular, to provide the "un & under" served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights.

But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in the markets where we operate. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at an unprecedented scale.

As a firm, we're audacious problem-solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership - of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do, and agility in execution.

We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best, and what is innovative. If you are smart, driven, and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology, come join our team. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to really make an impact.

Additional Info

Learn More About Us Here

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inAEDGvOcL8&t=29s

description:
PYTHON ENGINEER (CLOUD) – VERY OPEN TO NEGOTIATE




We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCLTECH Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission.




JOB TITLE: PYTHON ENGINEER (CLOUD)

JOB LOCATION: HCMC

ABOUT HCLTECH VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED

HCLTECH Vietnam Company Limited belongs to HCLTech.

HCLTech is a global technology company, home to more than 223,400 people across 60 countries,

delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud, and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending June 2023 totaled $12.8 billion. To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit https://www.hcltech.com/.




Our Vietnam-based offices:

• Hanoi Office: Level 13-17, Leadvisors Tower, 643 Pham Van Dong Street, Co Nhue Ward, North

Tu Liem District, Hanoi

• HCMC Office: Level 11, Five Star Tower, 28Bis Mac Dinh Chi Street, Da Kao Ward, District 1, HCMC




DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – buying a home, building a business, or saving for big or small things. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future. Be a part of building the ideal data ecosystem from scratch. Ensuring the right data is generated from all

applications and sourced at the right velocity with the complete depth and breadth to ensure complete coverage and reuse. This is your opportunity to build new, not fix old.

What will your day look like:

• Building and running the data processing pipeline on Google Cloud Platform

• Work with Implementation teams from concept to operations to provide deep technical expertise for successfully deploying large scale data solutions in the enterprise and use modern

data/analytics technologies on GCP

• Design pipelines and architectures for data processing

• Implement methods for DevOps automation of all parts of the built data pipelines to deploy from development to production

• Formulate business problems as technical data problems while ensuring that key business drivers

are captured in collaboration with product management

• Extract, load, transform, clean and validate data

• Support and debug data pipelines




JOB REQUIREMENTS

We are trying to reimagine the way we help and interact with our customers, so we are looking for

candidates with creativity, an open mind and positive energy. Our requirements are as below:

Must have:

 * Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field
 * At least 2 Years of Experience working on developing backend / platform applications using modern programming languages such as Python, Java, JS, Go, Rust.
 * Experience with provisioning services on top of Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) & Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CDK, Pulumi...)
 * Experience with constructing CI/CD workflows.
 * Experience with (or having knowledge on) building data intensive applications.
 * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues.
 * Working proficiency in English, both verbal and writing.

Nice to have:

 * Experience in developing big-data pipelines (batch, streaming processing) is a huge plus
 * Experience in developing automation processes and Observability is a huge plus.
 * Interested in working with data platforms / eager to learn more about data is a huge plus.
 * Familiar with Docker, K8S




WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US:

• Very challenging project with ANZ Bank where latest technology are applied and talented engineers are gathered

• Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus.

• Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for

Employee and Family

• 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working

• 100% salary during probation time

• Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to

travel onsite (in 60 countries)

• Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English)

• Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries

• 18 paid leaves per year

• Hybrid Mode (3 working days at office, flexible time)




HCLTECH Technologies Limited is committed to protecting and securing the privacy and confidentiality of the Personal Data which it collects directly or indirectly from you when applying for a job at HCLTECH either directly or through a third-party human resources agency.




We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCLTECH Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission.

title: [HCL x ANZ] Python Cloud Engineer (Data Platform Team)

description:
About us

The Data & Technology Team within the Strategy & Innovation Office will leverage technology and data to help our business create and innovate. We are looking for a data science leader who is obsessed about bridging between data and decision-making. This role will be responsible for the build, scale and shape the direction of our business through data science & analytics. The ideal candidate is "full-stack" data powerhouse who uses data to guide decision making to ensure the best experiences. This role will report to the Data Scientist Manager .



1. 6 Month Expectations

• Support Technology and Product Management team in mapping out the data vision and future state data pipeline and architecture

• Translate business questions and concerns into specific analytical questions that can be answered with available data using statistical and machine learning methods

• Provide feedback to our science and engineering teams on the applicability of technical solutions from the business perspective

• Solve real-world problems by getting and analyzing large amounts of data, diving deep to identify business insights and opportunities, designing simulations and experiments, developing statistical and ML models tailored to business needs, and collaborating with Scientists, Engineers, BIEs, and Product Team.

• Develop statistical and analytic models to uncover insights and segmentations that drive the business forward and uncover new areas of opportunities

• Apply machine learning methodologies by developing new sources, developing and testing enhancements, running computational experiments, and fine-tuning parameters for new ones

• Write code (Python, Scala, SQL, etc.) to obtain, manipulate, and analyze data



2. 12+ Month Expectations

• Build decision-making models and propose solutions for the business problem you define

• Formalize assumptions about how our systems are expected to work, create statistical definition of the outlier, and develop methods to systematically identify outliers. Work out why such examples are outliers and define if any actions are needed.

• Given anecdotes about anomalies or using automatic scripts to define anomalies, deep dive to explain why they happen, and identify fixes

• Drive implementation forward while enabling the business scaling vectors

• Develop scalable data pipelines to support analytics needs

• Communicate verbally and in writing to business customers with various levels of technical knowledge, educating them about our research, as well as sharing insights and recommendations

• Build and lead a team of data scientists and analysts to develop AI, ML and other algorithmic solutions to automate tasks and generate insights



3. Basic Qualifications

• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Machine Learning, Mathematics and Statistics)

• 4+ years of experience in a leading technology role (Data Scientist)

• Experience in establishing and building data architecture, pipeline, and model deployment from the ground up in ambiguous environment

• Experience applying various machine learning techniques to solve complex business problems, and understanding the key parameters that affect their performance

• Experience developing experimental and analytic plans for data modeling processes, use of strong baselines, and the ability to accurately determine cause and effect relationships.

• Expert fluency in SQL-based data manipulation

• In-depth experience using scripting languages such as R or Python for data analysis



4. Preferred Qualifications

• Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, or a related quantitative field with at least 5+ years of working experience as a Data Scientist).

• High degree of business acumen and real world perspective to effectively plan, prioritize, and build new technologies that align with business growth



APPLICATION:

Should you be interested in this position, kindly send your profile and cover letter to email: sio_hr@vinamilk.com.vn (Recruitment Team – HR Dept.)

----

Please note that only qualified profiles will receive a reply and be contacted for an interview due to the large of number of applications Vinamilk receives.

Thanks for your attention and application!

title: Senior Data Scientist

description:
FOUNDED IN 1926, PUBLICIS GROUPE IS NOW THE 2ND LARGEST COMMUNICATIONS GROUP IN THE WORLD. THROUGH A POWERFUL ALCHEMY OF CREATIVITY AND TECHNOLOGY, WE ARE DRIVING BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION ACROSS THE ENTIRE VALUE CHAIN.





Job Description



Join Digitas as a Data Analytics Manager, where you'll collaborate with brilliant minds to pioneer marketing solutions and transform ambitious businesses.



We're seeking a talented individual with a passion for data and technology, who can analyze large datasets from multiple sources, drive insights, and contribute to the bigger picture of marketing and business.



If you're ready to be part of a dynamic team and make a difference in marketing analytics, apply now!



Responsibilities:



As an Data Analytics Manager you will ensure robust analytical frameworks and methodologies are applied for our Clients.



Together with your Team of Executives and other stakeholders in Vietnam and SEA, you will gather, organize / structure, and validate large data sets from various activities, sources and markets. Then, using data mining, science and visualization techniques you will analyze data sets to find insights that will help inform plans and improve performance.



Detailed responsibilities include:



 * Gain deep knowledge of the Client's business, data, and marketing technology stack
 * Analyze large marketing datasets in a variety of databases and systems, to uncover insights and trends for informed decision-making
 * Collaborate with cross-functional Teams to collect data requirements, identify data-driven solutions and optimization opportunities
 * Design, develop, and maintain performance dashboards, reports, and visualizations for effective communication of insights to various internal and external stakeholders
 * Optimize data storage, connectivity, and retrieval processes and relevant technology solutions
 * Implement data quality and integrity measures including database schema and data pipeline to ensure accurate, integrated and valid / reliable analytics outputs
 * Conduct quality checks on collected data to identify and resolve any inconsistencies or discrepancies, track and resolve issues
 * Identify process improvement and automation opportunities to enhance data analytics operations and outcomes
 * Lead the kick-off meeting to explain the data collection process, timeline, requirements, and the weekly check-ins to track each market's progress and perform quality checks
 * Develop and maintain relevant processes and documentations
 * Ensure adherence to established guidelines, compliance with data privacy and security regulations
   
   

Qualifications


 * 3 years of experience in data analytics, preferably in relevant media and communications, marketing environments.
 * Understanding of media planning and media / CRM activation principles as well as familiarity with data/reports from martech platforms like Salesforce, CM360, DV360, Facebook, Google Ads, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter, etc.
 * Strong analytical skills with expertise in data manipulation, statistical analysis, and large-scale data visualization
 * Knowledge of data warehousing technologies, including data modeling, schema design, and ETL processes
 * Solid understanding of media and communications, related performance metrics, and attribution models
 * Proven end to end experience in managing analytical projects and Team independently, effectively and efficiently
 * Strong problem-solving abilities and strategic thinking for data-driven decision-making, attention to details
 * Excellent communication skills to convey complex data insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders (fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English)
 * Familiarity with data security and privacy practices, including access controls, encryption, and anonymization
 * Passion for discovering untapped opportunities for clients and contributing to the team's success
   
   

Additional Information


 * Potential challenges and chances
 * Work in a professional, active, international and dynamic environment.
 * Open to travel oversea for training in Singapore

title: AI Developer

description:
As Blueclip, we started our journey to bring the most creative minds and the know-how together to deliver great works.




About Our Search

We are currently looking for an AI Prompt Engineer for Content Creation to join our client, a global leader in AI-driven cryptocurrency analytics. This role offers the opportunity to combine creativity and technical expertise to revolutionize content production in the cryptocurrency space.




What are we looking for?

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Journalism, or a related field.

• 3+ years of experience in content creation, prompt engineering, or related roles.

• Extensive experience with ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and Runway ML.

• Expert-level proficiency with Zapier for workflow automation.

• Strong writing and editing skills with meticulous attention to detail.

• Excellent understanding of SEO principles and content optimization techniques.

• Proven track record of creating effective prompts for high-quality, engaging content.

• Creative mindset with an eye for visual design and data visualization.

• Familiarity with cryptocurrency markets and blockchain technology.




Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience in the fintech or cryptocurrency industry.

• Knowledge of content management systems and publishing platforms.

• Familiarity with data analysis and visualization tools.

• Understanding of AI ethics and responsible AI use in content creation.

• Experience with A/B testing and content performance analysis.




What will you do?

This role is at the forefront of integrating AI into content creation, allowing you to innovate and impact the crypto market analysis and education landscape.

• Design and implement effective prompts for AI models to generate accurate, engaging crypto-related content.

• Create diverse content types, including articles, market analyses, educational materials, and visual assets.

• Use Zapier to automate workflows and integrate AI-generated content into the platform.

• Continuously refine and optimize prompts based on performance metrics and user engagement.

• Develop creative solutions for visual content generation using tools like Midjourney and Runway ML.

• Ensure all AI-generated content aligns with the brand voice, quality standards, and SEO best practices.

• Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to align content strategy with business goals.




Why join this team?

Join a mission-driven team at the cutting edge of AI and cryptocurrency. With a remote-first work environment, competitive salary, and equity package, this role offers the opportunity to innovate and make a lasting impact on crypto education and analytics.




Ready to lead the next wave of AI-driven content? Apply now!

description:
Responsibilities

 * Build and develop large-scale data storage and processing systems (Big Data).
 * Develop scalable and highly reliable ETL solutions to handle data ingestion from various sources, including structured, streaming, and high-velocity data.
 * Build and enhance data mining and data management tools.
 * Design detailed solutions for data collection, normalization, cleaning, enrichment, storage, processing, analysis, and visualization of big data.
 * Collaborate with Data Scientists to translate machine learning models, algorithms, and data mining techniques into specifications and software designs that ensure effective implementation and deployment in distributed computing environments with scalable capabilities for rapidly growing input datasets.
 * Design solutions and directly develop foundational, reusable modules and libraries with widespread impact.




Qualifications

 * Bachelor’s degree or higher
 * Fluent in English
 * Knowledge of programming, data structures, and algorithms.
 * Knowledge of distributed data storage and processing, and big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Elastic Search, etc.).
 * Understanding of data processing workflows (batch processing, stream processing, etc.).
 * Knowledge of various types of databases (RDBMS, Graph Databases, NoSQL products, etc.).
 * Proficiency in programming languages (Java, Scala, etc.) and SQL.
 * Expertise in at least one of the big data frameworks or libraries (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Zookeeper, etc.).
 * Experience with at least one of the databases (Oracle, Neo4j, HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB, etc.).




Benefits

 * Competitive salary: The salary will be based on the candidate’s skills and experience, with the potential for bonuses based on performance and capabilities. 
 * Professional growth opportunities: The position offers opportunities for professional development and growth in the field of software development. 
 * Flexible working hours: Freelancer Developers have the flexibility to choose their own working hours, allowing for a better work-life balance. 
 * Diverse projects: Working as a Freelancer Developer provides exposure to a variety of projects, industries, and technologies, allowing for continuous learning and skill enhancement. 
 * Remote/Hybrid work: The position offers the option to work remotely, providing flexibility and eliminating the need for commuting. 
 * Creative and dynamic work environment: Freelancer Developers will have the opportunity to work in a creative and dynamic environment, collaborating with diverse teams and clients. 
 * International exposure: Working on projects with clients from different countries provides the opportunity to gain international exposure and broaden professional networks

description:
COMPANY INFORMATION




Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited (BGSV) is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at e-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.




Office location:

 * HCM: Etown 2, 364 Cong Hoa, Ward 13, Tan Binh Dist., HCMC/ OfficeHaus Building, 32 Tan Thang street, Son Ky ward, Tan Phu district
 * Hanoi: Capital Place building, 29 Lieu Giai, Ba Dinh, Hanoi




JOB DESCRIPTION




We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI Engineer/ Data Scientist to join our team. As a Senior AI Engineer/ Data Scientist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge solutions using Python, Machine Learning, LLMs, and classical NLP methodologies. You will work closely with our team of experts to analyze data, build models, and create innovative (Gen)AI solutions. Additionally, you will guide junior colleagues and possibly lead a topic.

Main responsibilities:

 * Design, develop, and implement advanced machine learning algorithms, models and LLM-based pipelines
 * Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and patterns
 * Write production quality code in Python, using standard software engineering best practices (git, testing, etc.)
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify, understand and solve business problems
 * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, GenAI and data science
 * Collaborate with software engineers to integrate AI models into production systems
 * Provide guidance and mentorship to junior data scientists and engineers

Qualifications

 * At least a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field
 * Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science and AI engineering
 * Strong proficiency in programming languages like Python
 * In-depth knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques
 * Experience with LLMs and RAG or agent frameworks (Langchain, LLamaIndex, etc.)
 * Proficiency in NLP (Natural Language Processing) techniques and libraries
 * Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
 * Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
 * Ability to work independently and motivation to integrate to and shape a team environment
 * Strong attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks




WHY BOSCH?

Because we do not just follow trends, we create them. Together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.

Benefits and Career Opportunities

 * Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam and Top 30 of the Most Innovative Companies all over the world
 * Join in a dynamic and fast-growing global company (English-speaking environment), with opportunity to work in global projects and being a part of innovation team contributing initiative ideas to the hi-tech world
 * Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in worldwide offices
 * Engage in our diverse training programs which surely help strengthen both your personal and professionalism
 * 13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal
 * 100% offered salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation
 * 15++ days of annual leave + 1-day of birthday leave
 * Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members
 * Flexible working time and working model
 * Lunch and parking allowance
 * Good benefits of company activities such as: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic, team building…

description:
LARION, a global software outsourcing partner with 2 decades deep industry expertise. We are a 100% Vietnam technology company specializing in turnkey solutions and building highly skilled development teams for companies of all size and types of business. Run by a team of successful entrepreneurs and dedicated technical experts - LARION is a unique symphony where we create a frictionless future for customers with passion, while maintaining full compliance with your needs and objectives.




I. What You’ll Do

 * Participate in designing distributed system architecture for systems and services.
 * Participate in development and maintenance of backend services in Python.
 * Participate in development and maintenance of web user interfaces.
 * Coordinate with stake holders such as infrastructure team, business team, etc … to resolve issues.




II. What You’ll Bring

 * 4+ years of hands-on using Python to develop scalable and robust software applications in web environments with exposure to backend stacks.
 * Exceptional experience with Python.
 * Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, Object Oriented Programming.
 * Working knowledge of Unix/Linux environment.
 * Having knowledge and experience with web front-end development is a big plus.
 * Experience with CI/CD, microservices, caching tools, data visualization, queuing systems, or large-scale distributed systems is a great plus.
 * Working experience or willingness to work with C++ is an advantage.
 * Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills.
 * Excellent interpersonal skills.
 * Good command of English (oral communication).




III. Why You’ll Love Working Here

1/. Working place:

 * Join a young and dynamic team with awesome projects applying the latest technology.
 * Working with specialists from all over the world provides you with a fantastic opportunity to expand your skill set.
 * Culture of openness and honesty in which individuals are respected and encouraged to achieve their full potential.




2/. Benefit comprise:

 * 13th-month salary and attractive performance bonuses.
 * Premium Healthcare and Accident Insurance.
 * Annual health check package.
 * Free parking and allowances: Lunch, Marriage, Newborn baby, Bereavement and others applied.
 * A spacious pantry that is fully equipped with coffee maker, fridge, microwave and more for your most comfortable lunchtime.
 * A wide range of sports and social activities: Yoga, Football, Badminton, Tech clubs, etc.
 * Annual company trip and team building.
 * Chance to be honored quarterly and annually with recognition awards for individuals, teams, long-term service, etc.

description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

Design and Develop AI Models and Algorithms:

 * Create and implement artificial intelligence systems by designing and developing algorithms from scratch.
 * Work on tasks such as speech recognition, image processing, and decision-making processes within business applications.
 * Integrate AI Solutions:
 * Implement AI solutions that integrate with existing business systems to enhance functionality and user interaction. This involves writing code, deploying models to production, and continuously monitoring and updating them as needed.

Manage Data Flow and Infrastructure:

 * Handle the data flow and infrastructure necessary for effective AI deployment. This includes managing data pipelines, storage, and processing resources.
 * Generative AI:
 * Collect and preprocess data to ensure it is suitable for training generative models. This may involve handling large datasets, augmenting data, and ensuring high data quality.
 * Fine-tune hyperparameters and deploy generative models into production environments.
 * Stay current with the latest advancements in generative AI, machine learning, and related fields.

Collaborate Across Teams:

 * Collaborate with other teams to align AI initiatives with organizational goals. Effective communication and teamwork are essential for successful AI implementation.

JOB REQUIREMENT
 * Bachelor or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields.
 * Strong experience in machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and computer vision.
 * Familiarity with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
 * Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and experience with AI frameworks like OpenAI's GPT, Copilot, or similar.
 * Proven experience in developing and refining prompts for AI applications.
 * Experience with Large Language Models (LLM) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques is highly desirable.
 * Proficiency in English communication.

WHAT'S ON OFFER

Caring Mental & Physical Recreation:

 * Hybrid working: 2 days at the office and 3 days WFH

 * Full salary in probation

Gene Solutions is a leading biotech company specializing in innovative genetic solutions for healthcare. With a strong presence across Southeast Asia, including branches in Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, the Philippines, and Indonesia, we are at the forefront of advancing healthcare through cutting-edge genetic testing.

description:
Job Purpose

- The job holder proposes, initiates, and manages multiple ML projects together with the business in order to address problems raised before linked to company OKRs and product enhancements using DS methods, processes, and systems on unstructured, diverse Big Data sources.

- The job holder also participates in strategic decision circles and contributes to guiding business data at a high level and providing strategic data guidance

- The job holder is required to allocate resources, decide strategically on projects, and then cascade down to leads




Key Accountabilities (1)

Data Solutions

- Evaluate the effectiveness of proposed models and track business performance KPIs against the data model.

- Build cutting-edge algorithms and work with machine learning and deep learning tools to deliver advanced analytics solutions across the firm including recommendation engines, customized data models, etc.

- Drive application of machine learning and big data techniques across different journeys and squads.

- Manage, execute, and review complex data science projects in an agile manner and in compliance with internal regulatory requirements.




Key Accountabilities (2)

Data Insights

- Lead the identification and interpretation of meaningful and actionable insights from large data and metadata sources together with business partners.

- Review processes and tools designed to monitor and analyze model performance and prediction accuracy.

- Proactively lead discussions in 3+ squads to identify questions and issues for data science

- Collaborate with Data Engineers to build complex, technical algorithms in data analytics software applications to improve work efficiency.

- Know at all times your data (size, average, distributions, outliers, CR, etc) and be able to estimate model output, and impact, and come up with sanity checks to detect bugs (discrepancies between expectations and results)




Key Accountabilities (3)

Project Management

- Own the project, manage POs, keep everyone on track from distractions, aligned towards lowest hanging fruit and KPI

- Manage project conflicts, challenges, and dynamic business requirements to keep operations running at high performance.

- Work with team leads to resolve people problems and project roadblocks, conduct post-mortem and root cause analysis to help squads continuously improve their practices to ensure maximum productivity.

Talent Development

- Manage allocated team, focus on retention and growth of the scientists, personal development, and KPI

- Mentor and coach junior fellows into fully competent Data Scientists.

Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team




Key Relationships - Direct Manager

Director, Data Science




Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences

Qualifications

- Master’s degree (or higher) in Statistics, Mathematics, Quantitative Analysis, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology or other Numerical Disciplines




Work Experience

- 3+ years of relevant experience in areas of data analysis, machine learning, deep learning model

development of large amounts of data, implementing and deploying various statistical models

- English proficiency requirements are according to Techcombank's policy

- Deep experience in querying databases and coding (e.g. Python, R, Spark, Scala, SQL, Java, C, C++)

- Extensive experience in building data and analytics solutions and products, data mining and statistical analysis

- Experience in the application of machine learning and AI to questions related to the financial markets

- Working location: Hanoi/HCM




Why Techcombank?

 * You will grow with Techcombank by having the opportunity to learn from top experts from across the world

title: (HN/HCM) Data Scientist/Senior Data Scientist

description:
The Mid-Level Data Scientist will be responsible for leading a cross-functional team to build and deploy GenAI use cases and applications in the entry phase of the project. The customer is in the experimental phase with data analytics and GenAI, requiring hands-on leadership in guiding the development process. The candidate will work closely with Data Engineers, Data Analysts, back-end and front-end developers, UI/UX designers, and Business Analysts to ensure that the team delivers scalable and impactful GenAI solutions.

Responsibilities:

Lead GenAI Use Case Development:


 * Drive the development of GenAI applications from experimentation to production, focusing on identifying opportunities for AI-driven innovation.
 * Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into GenAI solutions.
 * Lead the research, design, and implementation of AI models (NLP, predictive analytics, etc.) that address specific customer requirements.
   
   

Team Leadership and Coordination:


 * Lead a team that includes Data Engineers (DE), Data Analysts (DA), back-end and front-end developers, UI/UX designers, and Business Analysts (BA).
 * Provide technical guidance and mentorship to the team, ensuring alignment with project goals and timelines.
 * Oversee and coordinate the integration of AI models into applications, ensuring collaboration between all team members (e.g., UI/UX, front-end, back-end).
   
   

Data-Driven Experimentation:


 * Experiment with various machine learning and AI algorithms to assess their potential for solving customer problems.
 * Use data analytics to test hypotheses and fine-tune models during the experimental phase.
 * Ensure the use of best practices in data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.
   
   

Collaborate with Stakeholders:


 * Engage with customers to define business problems and opportunities for GenAI applications.
 * Present findings, insights, and the business value of GenAI solutions to stakeholders in a clear and accessible manner.
 * Partner with the Business Analysts (BAs) to ensure business goals are well-reflected in the technical solutions.
   
   

Project Management:


 * Manage project timelines, ensuring that deliverables are met according to the project plan.
 * Monitor and adjust development phases based on experimentation results and evolving customer needs.
 * Collaborate with customers in HCM and internal teams to ensure alignment with customer expectations.
   
   

Key Deliverables:

GenAI Use Cases and Applications:


 * Lead the development and delivery of GenAI applications, from experimentation to production.
 * Provide end-to-end data pipelines for AI model training and deployment, working closely with Data Engineers and Data Analysts.
   
   

AI Models and Insights:


 * Develop and deploy machine learning models (e.g., NLP, recommendation systems, predictive models) based on customer needs.
 * Deliver actionable insights and reports derived from AI models to customers and internal stakeholders.
   
   

Project Documentation and Reporting:


 * Maintain thorough documentation of GenAI use case development, including technical documentation, model specifications, and user guides.
 * Regularly report progress to stakeholders, including experiment results, model performance, and timelines.
   
   

What We Offer:


 * Innovative Environment: A dynamic and collaborative work environment where innovation is encouraged.
 * Professional Growth: Opportunities for professional growth and development through continuous learning and exposure to cutting-edge technologies.
 * Competitive Package: Competitive salary and benefits package
 * Impactful Work: The chance to work on cutting-edge projects with industry-leading clients, making a tangible impact on their business success.
   
   

Apply now!

Due to the high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We apologize for this inconvenience!
